Name: Aasimar
Description: This supernaturally beautiful woman looks human, yet emanates a strange sense of calm and benevolence.

Name: Abaia
Description: This multi-eyed eel’s brightly colored markings shift in complex, ever-changing patterns.

Name: Abasheen Genie
Description: This being stands 8 feet tall in flowing robes of purple and gold. Its hair is black and tied back in a ponytail with a ribbon of gold.

Name: Aberrant
Description: This hulking giant is hideous and deformed. Its body is covered in coarse, dark hair and oozing blisters.

Name: Abrikandilu
Description: This deformed, horned, hunchbacked humanoid has a forked, ratlike tail and two thumbs on each taloned hand.

Name: Abyss Gigas

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Shortspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A shortspear is about 3 feet in length, making it a suitable thrown weapon.

Description: This ebon-skinned monstrosity has a gaping maw with boar-like tusks and a wide nose beneath a furrowed brow that lacks any sort of eyes or visible visual organs. Its corded muscles twist and writhe beneath its smooth, hairless jet hide, giving its frame a gnarled, unbalanced asymmetry. It moves with a loping gait, however, and wears its armor, composed of thick, welded plates, effortlessly.

Name: Abyssal Larva
Description: This creature looks like a puffy and bloated human-sized whitish-yellow maggot with purplish veins pulsating under its fleshy form. A vaguely humanoid head sits atop its body and its facial features are twisted and distraught as if the creature was in a constant state of pain. A pair of large, downward-curving horns juts from its head, just above its sunken eyes. Its mouth is lined with filthy and sharpened fangs.

Name: Abyssal Wolf
Description: This creature is a man-sized wolf with deep blackish-blue fur and fiery orange eyes. Its coat is caked with blood, and bits of flesh hang from its toothy maw.

Name: Adaro
Description: This hybrid of human and shark holds its spear menacingly, thick, glistening saliva dripping from its razor-sharp teeth.

Name: Addu
Description: Striped with the brilliant colors of a maritime sunset, this beast winds its enormous body through the waves, a pair of wiry, talon-tipped arms and a snout full of horrendous teeth preceding a fan of razorlike fins.

Name: Adherer
Description: This creature appears to be a withered humanoid wrapped in decaying and rotting bandages. Upon close inspection, what appeared to be bandages are actually loose folds of the creature’s skin. A sour-smelling odor fills the air around the creature.

Name: Adherer
Description: This creature appears to be a withered humanoid wrapped in decaying and rotting bandages. Upon close inspection, what appeared to be bandages are actually loose folds of the creature’s skin. A sour-smelling odor fills the air around the creature.

Name: Adhukait
Description: A pair of spiked fiends, interwoven through bodily cavities and impaling limbs, spin in a dance with their twin curved knives.

Name: Adlet
Description: This humanoid wolf’s fur is snowy white and its eyes piercing blue; it grips an ornate spear in its fist.

Name: Adult Cloud Dragon
Description: This dragon has a fringed and frilled head and wings that sweep back from its shoulders to its tail. Large, piercing rose colored eyes dominate its somewhat triangular head. Its tail trails off becoming misty and translucent near the tip.

Name: Adult Cloud Dragon
Description: This dragon has a fringed and frilled head and wings that sweep back from its shoulders to its tail. Large, piercing rose colored eyes dominate its somewhat triangular head. Its tail trails off becoming misty and translucent near the tip.

Name: Adult Lunar Dragon
Description: A shimmering halo surrounds this regal dragon’s spine-crowned head, and its vast wings ripple like milky gossamer lit by the moon.

Name: Adult Mist Dragon
Description: This great dragon has a ridge of swept-back horns encircling its head with two larger and longer horns just above its eyes dominating the others. A ridge of similar smaller horns runs the length of its back from its shoulders to its tail. Its body is long, snake-like, and semi-material. It possesses no visible wings. Its scaled body is grayish-white.

Name: Adult Sky Dragon
Description: Although wingless, this dragon twists gracefully though the sky, its scales reflecting the shifting hues of the heavens.

Name: Adult Solar Dragon
Description: This regal dragon glows like the sun. Its burnished wings shimmer the color of flames, and a crown of horns decorates its head.

Name: Adult Sovereign Dragon
Description: This magnificent dragon is covered in splendid gold scales, and horns jut from its head like a crown.

Name: Adult Time Dragon
Description: This dragon’s cracked scales creak with frightening, patient power. Some of its horns are ancient and brittle, others new and pristine.

Name: Adult Void Dragon
Description: This dragon’s ebony scales and horns are flecked with a substance that glows an eerie green. The folds of its wings reflect a starry sky.

Name: Adult Vortex Dragon
Description: This dragon twists and whips with near untraceable speed. Its horns, crests along its neck, and wings emit a glow like starlight.

Name: Aghash
Description: Draped in rags and hunched over on goatlike legs, this creature possesses a featureless face, save for a large eye ringed by fangs.

Name: Aghasura
Description: This immense creature looks like a horned rattlesnake, save for its two muscular arms, each of which wields a scimitar.

Name: Agyra
Description: This two-headed monstrosity has vast wings and a long tail covered in a forest of blades.

Name: Ahlinni
Description: This creature has a long, straight beak—fully half the length of its body—that tapers to a fine point. Wicked claws sprout from its wings. Its eyes are whitish-pink and its feathers are a mixture of blues, reds, yellows, and greens.

Name: Ahuizotl
Description: This bear-sized beast has a body like a squat simian, a dog’s face, and a long tail that ends in a clawed hand.

Name: Akata
Description: This hairless blue lion has twin tentacular tails. Dozens more thick tentacles quiver and twitch where its mane should be.

Name: Akhana
Description: Four gray arms project from a swirling mass resembling a giant eye, from which a tail-like appendage dangles.

Name: Akhlut
Description: A dorsal fin rises up from the back of this immense black-and-white-furred, wolf-like beast.

Name: Akvan
Description: Ornate armor covers this hulking creature, rocky protrusions jutting from its hide and fierce horns crowning its broad head.

Name: Alastor
Description: This entity stands at least 16 feet tall and its body is entirely cloaked in hellish red and yellow flames. Huge bat-like wings spread from its scaled body. Its arms end in clawed hands which hold a tight grip on a wickedly curved battleaxe of iron. Its eyes are black with red pupils and its mouth is filled with rows of fangs.

Name: Algoid
Description: This stocky, man-sized creature seems to be composed of living algae, dark green and brown in color.

Name: Algoid
Description: This stocky, man-sized creature seems to be composed of living algae, dark green and brown in color.

Name: Allosaurus
Description: This bipedal dinosaur has a mouth filled with sharp teeth and short, powerful arms that end in sharp claws.

Name: Almiraj
Description: This oversized rabbit has a single long, pearlescent horn protruding from its crown.

Name: Alpluachra
Description: This minuscule creature resembles a newt with three tails. It’s covered in a transparent slime, and looks hungry.

Name: Alraune
Description: An attractive green-skinned woman sits in the depths of this enormous, sweet-smelling flower.

Name: Amaimon Devil
Description: This massive creature stands nearly 10 feet tall and looks like a bloated, squat humanoid with scarlet flesh. It has a long curved and forked tail, clawed hands and feet, and a round, squashed head with two small horns just above its sapphire-colored eyes.

Name: Amon
Description: This wolf-headed humanoid stands at least 9 or 10 feet tall. His fur is brownish-black and his eyes and teeth are yellow. His great clawed hands are brownish in color and covered in shaggy fur.

Name: Amphisbaena
Description: This creature appears as a huge snake with a head at each end of its body. Its scales are blackish-blue with bands of lighter blue fading into its coloration near the middle of its body. Its heads are glossy-black and its eyes are crimson.

Name: Amphisbaena
Description: This creature appears as a huge snake with a head at each end of its body. Its scales are blackish-blue with bands of lighter blue fading into its coloration near the middle of its body. Its heads are glossy-black and its eyes are crimson.

Name: Ancient Cloud Dragon
Description: This dragon has a fringed and frilled head and wings that sweep back from its shoulders to its tail. Large, piercing rose colored eyes dominate its somewhat triangular head. Its tail trails off becoming misty and translucent near the tip.

Name: Ancient Cloud Dragon
Description: This dragon has a fringed and frilled head and wings that sweep back from its shoulders to its tail. Large, piercing rose colored eyes dominate its somewhat triangular head. Its tail trails off becoming misty and translucent near the tip.

Name: Ancient Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Ancient Lunar Dragon
Description: A shimmering halo surrounds this regal dragon’s spine-crowned head, and its vast wings ripple like milky gossamer lit by the moon.

Name: Ancient Mist Dragon
Description: This great dragon has a ridge of swept-back horns encircling its head with two larger and longer horns just above its eyes dominating the others. A ridge of similar smaller horns runs the length of its back from its shoulders to its tail. Its body is long, snake-like, and semi-material. It possesses no visible wings. Its scaled body is grayish-white.

Name: Ancient Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Ancient Sky Dragon
Description: Although wingless, this dragon twists gracefully though the sky, its scales reflecting the shifting hues of the heavens.

Name: Ancient Solar Dragon
Description: This regal dragon glows like the sun. Its burnished wings shimmer the color of flames, and a crown of horns decorates its head.

Name: Ancient Sovereign Dragon
Description: This magnificent dragon is covered in splendid gold scales, and horns jut from its head like a crown.

Name: Ancient Time Dragon
Description: This dragon’s cracked scales creak with frightening, patient power. Some of its horns are ancient and brittle, others new and pristine.

Name: Ancient Void Dragon
Description: This dragon’s ebony scales and horns are flecked with a substance that glows an eerie green. The folds of its wings reflect a starry sky.

Name: Ancient Vortex Dragon
Description: This dragon twists and whips with near untraceable speed. Its horns, crests along its neck, and wings emit a glow like starlight.

Name: Android
Description: This slender woman moves with a strange, calculated grace. Complex blue tattoos glow on her pale flesh.

Name: Androsphinx
Description: This regal, bird-winged lion has a human’s head, clad in the golden raiment of a powerful pharaoh.

Name: Ankheg
Description: This burrowing, bug-like monster scuttles about on six legs, drooling noxious green ichor from its clacking mandibles.

Name: Ankou
Description: Cloaked by wings of darkness, this horrific, skeletal alien appears to be burning from within, a flaming glow shining through its emaciated chest. Among this gaunt being’s most prominent features are shimmering black wings, sharp talons, and yellow eyes that radiate a lambent malice.

Name: Annis Hag
Description: This repulsive, hunchbacked crone has skin the color of a fresh bruise. Despite her hunch, she looms taller than a human.

Name: Antelope
Description: This graceful animal has long slender legs and a pair of sharp, sturdy horns arching back from its head.

Name: Apocalypse Locust
Description: An unnerving, buzzing drone emerges from a creature resembling a tortured human half transformed into a giant, winged scorpion.

Name: Arach
Description: This six-armed humanoid has a lithe build and stands just under seven feet tall. It has a narrow aquiline face and bony plates protruding from its thorax and limbs.

Name: Aranea
Description: This bloated spider has a hunchbacked body and a gleam of intelligence in its multiple eyes.

Name: Arbiter
Description: A sphere of bronze and copper set with a single eye, this winged creature has two clawed hands, one of which clutches a knife.

Name: Arcanoplasm
Description: This creature resembles a giant, pale amoeba shot through with stripes of dark gray. Caught within its protoplasmic form are half-digested creatures of various types and sizes.

Name: Archaeopteryx
Description: This creature is roughly the size of a raven, with broad wings and a long tail compared to its body length.

Name: Archelon
Description: The shell of this immense sea turtle easily spans 12 feet in length. Its narrow head ends in a hooked beak.

Name: Archer Bush
Description: This creature looks like a small mound of brownish-green leaves. From its trunk sprout several thick branches, each covered sparsely with leaves, and each sporting rows of needle-like thorns. The leaves have small pale buds of gold and purple.

Name: Arctic Hare
Description: With shorter ears and limbs than other rabbits, this white rabbit is hard to spot in the snow.

Name: Arctic Tern
Description: This white-and-gray bird has a reddish-orange beak.

Name: Argus
Description: This misshapen giant is covered in horns, tumorous tentacles, unsightly warts, and strange, staring eyes.

Name: Armadillo
Description: This round, dust-colored creature’s snout pokes out of its bony armor shell.

Name: Arsinoitherium
Description: This creature is much like a rhino, some six feet tall and ten feet long, with a pair of massive, knife-like horns curving up from its nose.

Name: Ash Giant
Description: Towering above a typical human, this misshapen giant’s pale flesh is covered in purulent sores and bulbous tumors.

Name: Asp
Description: This long, muscular snake rears up and shows its hood and fangs when threatened.

Name: Asrai
Description: This being looks like a one–foot tall female elf with delicate features, emerald eyes, long golden hair, and pale blue skin.

Name: Astral Deva

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Shortspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A shortspear is about 3 feet in length, making it a suitable thrown weapon.

Description: This tall, human-like creature has long, feathery wings and a gentle inner radiance that makes it difficult to look directly at.

Name: Astral Leviathan
Description: Above this brobdingnagian, whalelike creature’s cavernous maw of freakish teeth, multiple eyes peer out in different directions.

Name: Astral Shark
Description: This creature resembles a shark with sickly white skin, tinged here and there with smears of pink. Its dorsal fin is jagged and slightly curved, and the creature’s eyes are large, bulbous, and lidless.

Name: Asurendra
Description: This four-armed humanoid horror is garbed in golden armor and surrounded by a nimbus of floating, glowing weaponry.

Name: Athach
Description: This giant’s maw contains a pair of dripping tusks, but it is its gangly third arm that makes its appearance truly bizarre.

Name: Atomie
Description: This creature resembles a small elf with narrow, pointed ears, long legs and arms, and lightly colored hair and eyes. Its skin has a light green color to it.

Name: Atomie
Description: This creature resembles a small elf with narrow, pointed ears, long legs and arms, and lightly colored hair and eyes. Its skin has a light green color to it.

Name: Augnagar
Description: This enormous, spider-like creature has three clawed tails and eight legs connected by leathery webs of flesh.

Name: Aurochs
Description: This large, horned bull has a dirty black hide and an aggressive temper. Its horns are wide and sharp.

Name: Aurumvorax
Description: Powerful muscles ripple beneath the golden fur of this small yet fearsome eight-legged beast.

Name: Aurumvorax
Description: Powerful muscles ripple beneath the golden fur of this small yet fearsome eight-legged beast.

Name: Avoral
Description: Great feathers sweep back from this fierce bird-man’s brow, and long, clawed hands grow from the end of his wings.

Name: Axe Beak
Description: This creature resembles a large ostrich with a strong, thick neck and sharpened beak. Its neck is covered in white feathers, and its body is covered in black feathers with a white underbelly and tail. Its legs are covered in yellow scales.

Name: Axe Beak
Description: This creature resembles a large ostrich with a strong, thick neck and sharpened beak. Its neck is covered in white feathers, and its body is covered in black feathers with a white underbelly and tail. Its legs are covered in yellow scales.

Name: Axiomite
Description: This creature resembles a flawless, perfect example of an elf. When it moves, parts of its body dissolve into golden, crystalline dust, swirling without wind, condensing into winding, artistic coils of symbols and equations before reforming into flesh a moment later.

Name: Azer

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Shortspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A shortspear is about 3 feet in length, making it a suitable thrown weapon.

Description: Heat ripples the air near this squat, brass-skinned humanoid. Its head and shoulders blaze with a mane of fire.

Name: Azruverda
Description: A humanoid head peers forth from this enormous creature’s beautifully iridescent, spike-covered beetle carapace.

Name: Baal

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: This diabolical-looking golden-skinned humanoid towers over you, dressed in battered bronze chainmail. It wields a large morningstar in its clawed hand as it stares at you. Its bovine head features large round eyes of black, a large nose, wolf-like upright ears, and a large mouth lined with razor-sharp teeth. Tiny forward-curving horns protrude from its forehead.

Name: Babbler
Description: This creature stands taller than a human and appears as a cross between a lizardman and gorgosaurus. Its reptilian body is covered in yellow scales and its underbelly is gray. Strange symbols and patterns of grayish-brown can be seen on its back.

Name: Baboon
Description: A hairy, stout animal with opposable thumbs, this creature has a pronounced muzzle and bright red buttocks.

Name: Baccae
Description: An attractive woman with long flowing, rich, red hair and emerald green eyes seductively moves toward you. She wears a billowy white robe emblazoned with archaic symbols and runes.

Name: Badger
Description: The squat, waddling badger trudges forth. Thrusting its flattened nose about the ground, it sniffs incessantly.

Name: Baku
Description: This floating creature has long brown fur. Its face features a pair of long tusks and a curious elongated trunk for a snout.

Name: Balisse Angel
Description: This celestial being’s body is obscured by darkness, but its glorious wings glow brilliantly around it, outlining the silhouette of a stern individual with shining yellow eyes.

Name: Balor
Description: This winged fiend’s horned head and fanged visage present the perfection of the demonic form, fire spurting from its flesh.

Name: Banderlog
Description: This creature appears as a short, baboon-like creature with grayish-brown fur.

Name: Bandersnatch
Description: This six-limbed beast stalks forward with a fluid grace. Barbed quills run along its back, and its eyes glow with a blue light.

Name: Baobhan Sith
Description: This creature appears as a female elf with pearl white skin, golden hair, and eyes of emerald. Her figure is sleek and curved and she moves with a cat-like grace.

Name: Baphomet
Description: Fire burns on the central horn and in the rheumy eyes of this bestial winged demon, who stands more than twice a human’s height.

Name: Baphomet
Description: Fire burns on the central horn and in the rheumy eyes of this bestial winged demon, who stands more than twice a human’s height.

Name: Baregara
Description: This lumbering apelike monster has blood-red fur, twisted horns, and a hideous fanged orifice set in the center of its chest.

Name: Barghest
Description: This snarling, canine beast pads forward on all fours, its slender front limbs looking more like hands than a wolf’s paws.

Name: Baric
Description: This creature appears as a 6-legged rat with black fur and yellow eyes. It has a long duck-like bill lined with rows of needle-sharp teeth.

Name: Barometz
Description: This massive green ramlike creature’s pelt is actually a tangle of vines, and its horns are wickedly sharp wooden branches.

Name: Barrow Rat
Description: A chattering swarm of large, sickly looking brown rats emerge from everywhere. The creatures appear both half starved and agitated to aggression.

Name: Basilisk
Description: This squat, reptilian monster has eight legs, bony spurs jutting from its back, and eyes that glow with pale green fire.

Name: Basilosaurus
Description: This immense primeval whale has a sleek body that looks more serpentine than mammal, and jaws filled with sharp teeth.

Name: Bedlam
Description: This creature has no set form. Before your eyes it seems to shift from a vaguely humanoid form with yellow eyes and no other discernible facial features to a swirling mass of grayish-black crackling matter. In its latter form, blue-gray energy arcs and dances through its form, making it resemble a thundercloud shot through with lightning. It seems to constantly alter its form, as if it has no control over it.

Name: Behir
Description: This slithering, multilegged blue reptile has a fearsome head crowned with two large, curling horns.

Name: Belabra
Description: This creature resembles a man-sized flying jellyfish with twelve long tentacles. Four thin eyestalks protrude from its cap. Its cap is blackish-gray and its eyestalks are dark gray.

Name: Belker
Description: Dull, red eyes, grasping claws, and leathery wings give a demonic aspect to this creature’s smoky form.

Name: Bhole
Description: Darkness obscures the source of a deep grinding sound. Something vast and vaguely worm-like moves in the gloom, wrenching the earth apart as it moves.

Name: Biclops
Description: At first glance this monstrosity appears to be a filthy ettin of huge size. On closer inspection the true nature of the creature is revealed as it has but one eye in the center of each ugly head.

Name: Biloko
Description: This gnome-sized humanoid’s face is adorned with fiery red eyes and a sharp-toothed mouth that seems too wide for its head. The creature is garbed in leaves and possesses no hair—patches of grass and moss grow from its skin instead.

Name: Black Magga
Description: This enormous creature’s serpentine neck supports a leering reptilian head—its body is a wriggling mass of tentacles.

Name: Blindheim
Description: This creature is a 4-foot tall frog-like humanoid with large, bulbous eyes that constantly emits bright yellow beams of light. Its skin is mottled yellow, growing darker across its back. Its feet are webbed as are its claws.

Name: Blindheim
Description: This creature is a 4-foot tall frog-like humanoid with large, bulbous eyes that constantly emits bright yellow beams of light. Its skin is mottled yellow, growing darker across its back. Its feet are webbed as are its claws.

Name: Blood Golem
Description: This creature looks like a hideous, bloated slug, blood red in color. Two long spindly arms protrude from its upper body. It has no other discernible features.

Name: Blood Hag
Description: A bent-backed crone with long leathery arms ending in cruel flesh-shearing talons lurches out of the darkness. Her face is a misshapen mass of leathery flesh punctuated with a bulbous nose, like a gnarled knot on an old oak tree. Her massive brow overhangs sunken, lusterless, black eyes. The crone’s hair is a wriggling mass of red worms, hissing and mewling as they dribble blood down her ugly face.

Name: Blood Queen
Description: This hideous monstrosity looks like an enormous curled maggot, varicolored like deeply bruised flesh. Three flailing tentacles adorn each side of the thing’s huge, pulsating mouth, and five more arch from its hindquarters.

Name: Bloodsuckle
Description: This is a nightmarish plant consisting of a bulbous root and several vine-like tendrils, each ending in hollow, needle-like points. Woody limbs as thick as a human’s leg sprout from the trunk. Its leaves are a vile greenish color, and constantly drip a sticky, foul-smelling sap

Name: Boalisk
Description: This creature appears as a vile serpent with dark scales and reddish eyes.

Name: Bodythief
Description: This immense plant has jaws inside its central flower and vines that thresh the air. Its ovular seedpods throb like beating hearts.

Name: Bog Beast
Description: This creature appears as a large, shaggy, fur-covered humanoid with clawed hands and feet. Two, long, upright tusks protrude from its mouth. Its eyes are dull brown and its fur is brownish-yellow.

Name: Bog Creeper
Description: This creature looks like a man-sized rotting tree trunk with several thorny tendrils sprouting from its body. A single limb protrudes from its central form as well.

Name: Bog Strider
Description: A narrow, beetle-like creature glides across the water’s dark surface on four brown, spindly legs. It stands just over five feet tall, holding its head and thorax upright while clutching an intricately carved hunting spear in two clawed forelimbs. Powerful mandibles click in rhythm with the reed-thin antennae waving upon its head as if testing the air for the scent of prey.

Name: Bogeyman
Description: Dressed in a long dark coat and a tall hat, this lanky, fanged humanoid exudes an almost palpable aura of horror.

Name: Boggard

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: Bulbous eyes glare atop this creature’s decidedly toad-like head. A multitude of warts and bumps decorate its greenish skin.

Name: Boggart
Description: This gangly, long-armed creature has a face like a calf’s, but with large, forward-facing eyes and a mane of lank hair.

Name: Bogwid
Description: This nightmare shambles along the ground on eight muscular tentacles that leave behind a clear viscous residue stinking of putrefaction. Its amphibian skin is moist, green-black, and covered in warts and protuberances. On its back, dozens of fist-sized pustules shift and pulsate with nauseating vitality, like sentient oily bubbles threatening to burst.

Name: Bone Cobbler
Description: This creature appears as a tattered and desiccated humanoid with grayish flesh drawn tight over its bones. Its eyes are hollow sockets of darkness and its clothes are rags.

Name: Bonesnapper
Description: This creature resembles a man-sized upright dinosaur with gray-green flesh mottled with gray spots. Its eyes are scarlet and its teeth are yellow.

Name: Boruta
Description: Piercing yellow eyes gaze from the mossy skull of this ivy-covered skeleton. Where bones should be, gnarled roots grow, and tangles of vines hang from its moldering chest like spilt viscera.

Name: Brachiosaurus
Description: A long tail counterbalances this reptile’s equally long neck, at the end of which a relatively small head pulls food from the treetop.

Name: Brethedan
Description: This amorphous creature looks like a fleshy, iridescent dirigible, with no visible features save for tentacles dangling down in a line.

Name: Brijidine
Description: This beautiful woman has flesh made of lava. She soars through the sky on a trail of fire.

Name: Brimorak
Description: This muscular, red-eyed, goat-headed demon wields a burning sword. Fire licks up from its flaming hooves.

Name: Broken Soul Lillend
Description: Once a beautiful celestial with the torso of a winged woman and a snakelike body below, this creature is a mess of blood and scars.

Name: Brontotherium
Description: This massive beast vaguely resembles a rhinoceros with a forked nose horn. Its powerful body is covered with short bristly hair.

Name: Brownie
Description: This tiny creature resembles an elf with greenish skin. Its hair is light and it is dressed in bright clothing.

Name: Brownie
Description: This tiny creature resembles an elf with greenish skin. Its hair is light and it is dressed in bright clothing.

Name: Brume
Description: This semi transparent being has the appearance of a humanoid wrapped in a soggy funeral shroud. Long claws extend from the arms of the shroud, when its hood is thrown back a nose-less, ear-less face filled with needle like fangs and sunken black eye-sockets that glow with two wicked golden points of light. The creature has no apparent legs, seeming to hover inches from the ground, its “feet” nothing more than foul swirling vapors.

Name: Brush Thylacine
Description: This odd creature is about the size of a wolf, but it has the slender build of a cat, heavy whiskers, and dark stripes down its back. Its long tail flips about, smacking the ground as it scans the woods. It yips and bays in a complex pattern, offering warning to anything that may cross its path.

Name: Buckawn

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This creature is a halfling-sized humanoid with swarthy skin and dark hair. Its eyes are greenish-brown and its clothes are brown.

Name: Bugbear

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: This ugly creature resembles a twisted shadow puppet’s silhouette, a wild thing of flared black and brown fur whose pelt juts out from its body at freakish angles. The crouching shadow’s ears are large and floppy, draping shoulder-length, adding to the creature’s unnatural shape. Its eyes are too big for its head. Tremendous milk-white ovals loom on either side of the thing’s wheezy pig-like nose. Its panting mouth is filled with bristly needle-teeth spiderwebbed in disgusting strands of yellowish saliva, all vibrating to the tune of its wheezing breath.

Name: Buggane
Description: This hairless, hunchbacked giant has cruel tusks and two enormous, blunt-clawed fists that look strong enough to shatter stone.

Name: Bulette
Description: This armor-plated creature’s toothy maw gapes wide as a fin-like dorsal plate rises between its shoulders.

Name: Bull Shark
Description: This sleek, gray predator weaves back and forth through the water with savage grace.

Name: Bunyip
Description: This aquatic creature resembles a cross between a seal and a shark. Its front half is that of a black seal while its rear section is that of a grayish-black shark.

Name: Bunyip
Description: This aquatic creature resembles a cross between a seal and a shark. Its front half is that of a black seal while its rear section is that of a grayish-black shark.

Name: Burning Dervish
Description: This creature looks like a normal human with symbols and tattoos of alien design covering almost all of its body.

Name: Bythos
Description: A shimmering, colorless mass congeals to form a four-armed humanoid shape with an eye-like pattern in its torso.

Name: Cacodaemon
Description: An ever-gnashing maw, filled with row after row of mismatched teeth, dominates this frightful creature’s orb-like body.

Name: Cacodaemon
Description: An ever-gnashing maw, filled with row after row of mismatched teeth, dominates this frightful creature’s orb-like body.

Name: Cairn Linnorm
Description: Pallid and horribly gaunt, this enormous but emaciated dragonlike creature has two forearms and no wings.

Name: Calathgar
Description: The acrid scent of vinegar wafts from this shield-sized blossom. Amid shocking blue petals slowly twitches a cluster of sharp stamens arranged like a ring of teeth within a leafy muzzle.

Name: Calikang
Description: This blue-skinned, six-armed giant lurches to life, its armor and twin swords glittering with jewels.

Name: Cambion
Description: This demonic-looking creature resembles a somewhat stocky humanoid with scaly blue skin, small fangs, and tiny dark horns that protrude above its crimson-colored eyes.

Name: Canopy Creeper
Description: What at first appeared to be nothing more than a tangle of thick, twisted vines growing among the canopy of the trees suddenly coils itself into a large mass dangling high above. A large beaklike maw emerges from the center of the fecund mass, numerous thick, grasping vines whipping through the air.

Name: Capramace
Description: This twisted amalgamation of human and goat is covered in matted fur, its teeth sharp and eyes eerily blank.

Name: Carbuncle
Description: This creature resembles a cross between an anteater and armadillo. Embedded in its head is a large red jewel. The creature has a long snout and a low-slung body protected by several thick leathery bands. Its hide is dappled gray and brown, shading to lighter colors of gray on its underbelly.

Name: Carbuncle
Description: This creature resembles a cross between an anteater and armadillo. Embedded in its head is a large red jewel. The creature has a long snout and a low-slung body protected by several thick leathery bands. Its hide is dappled gray and brown, shading to lighter colors of gray on its underbelly.

Name: Carrion Claw
Description: This insect-like horror has six large, spear-like legs and a poison bite.

Name: Carrion Moth
Description: This creature resembles a giant-sized moth with long, beautiful wings covered in rippling patterns resembling skulls. Its head is rather centipede-like and four long tentacles surround its mouth. Its mouth has a single pair of needle-like mandibles.

Name: Cassisian
Description: This finely crafted golden helm is decorated with intricate filigree, and flutters gracefully through the air on feathered wings.

Name: Caterprism
Description: This creature looks like a crystalline caterpillar.

Name: Caterwaul
Description: This creature appears to be a feline-like elf with yellow eyes, dark blue fur, and a long swishing tail.

Name: Catfolk
Description: This lithe, catlike humanoid has a long tail and pointed ears. Her feline eyes sparkle with curiosity and mischief.

Name: Catoblepas
Description: This ugly creature has a boar-like head with short antlers, a thick bullish body covered in spines, and cloven hooves on its stumpy legs.

Name: Catrina
Description: With lengthy curling hair, a dancer’s dress, and a bouquet of flowers, this woman remains beautiful, despite having no flesh.

Name: Caulborn
Description: This creature has a split-jawed mouth, a hood-like growth on its head, and two hideously elongated fingers on each hand.

Name: Cave Giant
Description: Bestial tusks jut from the jaw of this hunched-over giant. It is clad in armor patched together from the bones of past victims.

Name: Cave Giant
Description: Bestial tusks jut from the jaw of this hunched-over giant. It is clad in armor patched together from the bones of past victims.

Name: Cave Leech
Description: This large, bloated creature has a flattened, semi-translucent body of sickly yellow. Eight whip-like tentacles protrude from the monster’s front, near its head. Hundreds of smaller tentacles line its body and seem to aid in locomotion. Its mouth is rounded and ringed with dozens of needle-like teeth.

Name: Cave Moray
Description: The creature is a brownish-gray, slug-like creature about 5 feet long and 1 foot thick. Its eyes are dark brown and bulbous.

Name: Cave Troll
Description: This ugly humanoid appears to be about 6 feet tall. Its leathery skin is blackish-gray and its eyes are yellow. It has long, upright ears, almost elven in nature. Its arms and legs are long and slender and end in wicked-looking claws.

Name: Cavern Lizard
Description: A 10-foot long gray lizard with large wide feet and sapphire-gold bulging eyes stares. Balanced upon thick and muscled, its feet cling to surfaces upon small suction cup-like pads. Its head is angular and somewhat flat and its mouth sports a row of long, serrated teeth.

Name: Cayhound
Description: This reddish-colored mastiff stands eye to eye with most dwarves. Within its powerful frame rumbles the distant sound of thunder.

Name: Centaur
Description: This creature has the sun-bronzed upper body of a seasoned warrior and the lower body of a sleek warhorse.

Name: Ceratioidi
Description: This flabby, fish-like humanoid has the wide mouth, bulging eyes, and dangling, luminescent flesh lure of a deep-sea predator.

Name: Cerberi
Description: Every strip of this three-headed hound’s hide has been peeled away, leaving wet sinew and bulging tendons exposed.

Name: Cerberus
Description: This creature is a giant-sized three-headed dog. Its fur is black and matted, and its eyes are crimson. Each mouth is dominated by long fangs, and each mouth drips foul-smelling saliva.

Name: Cerebral Stalker
Description: This humanoid creature has blackish-gray scales covering its semireptilian body. A thick layer of mucus drips from its body. Its bestial head sports slate-gray eyes with vertically slit pupils and a wide mouth lined with sharp teeth. Its hands end in filthy claws.

Name: Cerebric Fungus
Description: A swollen, brainlike bulb encrusted with fungal shelves squats atop several ropy legs. A wide mouth bisects the bulb’s crown.

Name: Ceru
Description: This pint-sized creature resembles a tiny blue elephant no larger than a house cat. Its feet, tail, and ears are clawed and spiked.

Name: Cervinal
Description: Beneath a crown of antlers, this centaurlike creature blends the upper body of a humanoid with the lower body of a majestic elk.

Name: Cetaceal
Description: This mermaid-like creature has the torso and head of a long haired woman and the lower half of a sleek killer whale.

Name: Ceustodaemon
Description: This brown, shaggy-furred beast stands on slate grey hooves. Its head resembles that of a maniacal horned ape.

Name: Chaneque
Description: This creature appears to be a cross between a pixie and a bat with charred flesh. Around its waist dangle tiny fairy skull trophies.

Name: Changeling
Description: This young woman has a slender frame and a beautiful face, yet there’s something vaguely unnerving about her appearance. Her skin is unnaturally pale, her hair is dark, and each of her eyes is a different color.

Name: Chaos Beast
Description: This thing is a horrid mass of barbed tentacles, glaring eyes, and gnashing teeth, twisting upon itself and reshaping into new forms.

Name: Charda
Description: Armored in dense, bony plates, this four-armed creature drools wretched strings of black bile from its fanged maw.

Name: Charybdis
Description: An immense spiny monster, its back plated in chitin and its belly in thick folds of blubber, rises hungrily from the center of a whirlpool.

Name: Chemosit
Description: This massive, shaggy beast uses long and muscular forearms to raise itself onto its hind legs and beats its chest like a gorilla. Despite its ape-like stance, its frame is far heavier and its features more primitive, its powerful muzzle and gnashing canines bespeaking terrible, bestial savagery.

Name: Cherum
Description: This hairless mountain of slick raw burning flesh seems to constantly sizzle and ooze with the stench of burning fat. Two long meaty arms sprout from a hugely obese frame; its head appears to be little more than a bald sloping brow with black pits for eyes. Its maw splits open to reveal cavernous jaws, teeth glowing like huge red hot coals.

Name: Chickcharney
Description: Resembling a filthy owl with the gangly long legs of a stork, this almost comically ugly bird has piercing black eyes and emits an annoying screech.

Name: Chimera
Description: This winged monster has the body of a lion, though two more heads flank its central feline one—a dragon and a horned goat.

Name: Chon Chon
Description: This flying head has incredibly large ears that constantly flap to keep the creature aloft. It babbles to itself as it flies, as if to remind itself of secrets only it knows.

Name: Chon Chon Swarm
Description: This flying head has incredibly large ears that constantly flap to keep the creature aloft. It babbles to itself as it flies, as if to remind itself of secrets only it knows.

Name: Chupacabra
Description: This lizard-like creature stalks forward upon two muscular legs, a mane of spikes running down its scaly back.

Name: Chupacabra
Description: This lizard-like creature stalks forward upon two muscular legs, a mane of spikes running down its scaly back.

Name: Churr
Description: The trees and underbrush in front of you explode forth sending a hail of leaves and brush in your direction. From the tangled mess emerged several feral, ape-like creatures with elongated nails and fangs.

Name: Chuul
Description: This lobster-like creature has a thick armored shell. A pair of tiny eyes gleams above a mouth full of writhing tentacles.

Name: Clawbat
Description: A leathery piece of skin stretched across a frame of joints and bony knobs beats awkwardly through the air. Eyes glare from the folds of its thick wings, writhing tentacles surround its sucker-like maw, and a long, thin tongue darts forth seemingly at random to lash the air around it.

Name: Cliff Giant
Description: This giant has a majestic presence and stoic bearing. His rocky, red-brown skin is shot through with streaks of shimmering color.

Name: Clockwork Familiar
Description: This tiny metallic creature is shaped like a raven, gears and belts whirring beneath its shining, articulated plates.

Name: Cockatrice
Description: This hideous avian creature has the body of an emaciated rooster, the wings of a bat, and a long, scaly tail.

Name: Cold Rider
Description: Jagged, twisting antlers of dark blue ice crown the helm of this ice-armored humanoid figure.

Name: Coloxus
Description: This figure would be the picture of elegance and refinement were it not for its grotesque fly head and shivering insectile wings.

Name: Common Time Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a formless cloud of yellowish-red vapor or dust about 5 feet in diameter.

Name: Compsognathus
Description: This small reptile has a snake-like neck and head, a bird-like body with strong legs for running, and a whip-like tail.

Name: Constrictor Snake
Description: This large snake has a thick, muscular body and dull green scales decorated with dirty brown stripes.

Name: Contemplative
Description: This floating creature is mostly pulsating brain-sac, with the body beneath it somewhere between that of an insect and a human fetus.

Name: Cooshee
Description: This creature appears as a large green and brown spotted dog with slightly elven features. It has a long, curling tail and ears that taper to points above its head.

Name: Coral Capuchin
Description: This strange creature can only be described as a light pink, hairless monkey with the head of a fish and large, finlike wings.

Name: Corpse Lotus
Description: Planted in soil fertilized with corpses, this giant, blood-red flower is surrounded by prickly vines.

Name: Corpse Orgy
Description: Screaming and wriggling, this foul being appears to be a pile of entwined moldering corpses.

Name: Corpse Rook
Description: This creature resembles a three-headed raven with oily black feathers and bright silver talons and beak. A pungent, almost sulfuric odor emanates from the creature. Its wings are tipped with silver feathers.

Name: Corpsespinner
Description: A massive, bone-white tarantula is the only way to describe this monster. Bands of gray and silver ring its abdomen and legs, and its body is covered in short, bristly hairs of white and silver. A large skull-like marking appears on the creature’s thorax. Its eight eyes are stark white.

Name: Couatl
Description: This great serpent has multicolored wings and eyes that glimmer with intense awareness.

Name: Coven Ooze
Description: This eerily disturbing gelatinous blob lumbers forward. Three disembodied eyes float within its mass, seemingly scanning back and forth with each surge of movement.

Name: Crag Man
Description: This creature resembles a thick, squat humanoid carved from stone. Small depressions in its head seem to function as eyes, and its mouth is a small, toothless crevice. Its arms end in powerful fists.

Name: Crimson Whale
Description: Similar to other whales in many ways, this giant aquatic beast is notable for its enormous teeth, menacingly strong jaws, and blood-red skin.

Name: Criosphinx
Description: This creature has the wings of a bird, the body of a lion, and the head of a ram with sad, wise eyes.

Name: Crocodile
Description: This reptile lunges out of the placid water with shocking speed. Its jaw gapes open in a roar, its powerful tail lashing behind.

Name: Crucidaemon

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: Its body seemingly made of iron, this shapely feminine form has wrists pierced by chains that end in curved blades.

Name: Crysmal
Description: An animated cluster of translucent crystals shaped disturbingly like a gemstone scorpion scuttles into an aggressive stance.

Name: Crystalline Horror
Description: This humanoid creature seems to be made entirely of crystal and glass. It is man-sized and its head sports no eyes, nose, ears, or mouth. Its body appears razor-sharp and jagged. Its hands end in wicked claws.

Name: Crystallis
Description: This massive creature appears to be formed of quartz, earth, and crystal and stands about 13 feet tall. Its powerful arms and legs end in razorsharp claws that glint and shine like polished steel. Its large rounded head sports two sunken crystalline eyes and a gaping toothless maw.

Name: Cthulhu
Description: This towering impossibility, neither quite octopus nor dragon nor giant but something far worse, must surely herald the end of times.

Name: Cyclops
Description: A single huge eye stares from the forehead of this nine-foot-tall giant. Below this sole orb, an even larger mouth gapes like a cave.

Name: Cythnigot
Description: This six-legged horror has a spider’s face and a fibrous stalk growing out of its back—a stalk ending in a snapping mouth.

Name: Cytillipede
Description: This segmented creature has a chitinous body covered in patches of glowing, purple fungus. Syrupy venom drips from its mandibles.

Name: Dagon
Description: This demon’s body is a nightmare of writhing tentacles and slippery coils below the leering maw of a deep sea predator.

Name: Dagon
Description: This demon’s body is a nightmare of writhing tentacles and slippery coils below the leering maw of a deep sea predator.

Name: Dakon
Description: This creature looks like an ape with brownish-black fur and yellow eyes with black pupils.

Name: Dandasuka
Description: This small creature looks like a well-dressed and jewelry-bedecked fiendish gnome, its face mostly mouth and fangs.

Name: Dark Caller

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: Wrapped in tatters of dark musty robes, this humanoid figure weaves malevolent magic.

Name: Dark Creeper

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This creature resembles a small humanoid with a light, thin frame. It has gray skin and stark-white eyes with gray pupils. It is dressed in brownish-black filthy clothing. The smell of dung and rotted meat hangs in the air around it.

Name: Dark Creeper

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This creature resembles a small humanoid with a light, thin frame. It has gray skin and stark-white eyes with gray pupils. It is dressed in brownish-black filthy clothing. The smell of dung and rotted meat hangs in the air around it.

Name: Dark Dancer
Description: Dancing in a wicked celebration, this slight humanoid is wrapped head to toe in dirty scraps of dark cloth.

Name: Dark Slayer
Description: This small humanoid is clothed in tattered rags from head to foot. Only its sinister eyes and pale hands are visible.

Name: Dark Stalker
Description: This creature appears as a man-sized humanoid with pallid skin. It is clothed in filthy and tattered robes of blackish-gray. The stench of rotted meat and dung clings to this creature

Name: Dark Stalker
Description: This creature appears as a man-sized humanoid with pallid skin. It is clothed in filthy and tattered robes of blackish-gray. The stench of rotted meat and dung clings to this creature

Name: Darkmantle
Description: As this creature falls from the cavern roof, it opens like a hideous octopus, its thin, hook-lined tentacles connected by a fleshy web.

Name: Death Dog
Description: This creature appears to be a two-headed hound with rich black fur and yellow piercing eyes. Each head constantly drips a foul-smelling saliva

Name: Death Dog
Description: This creature appears to be a two-headed hound with rich black fur and yellow piercing eyes. Each head constantly drips a foul-smelling saliva

Name: Death Worm
Description: This creature is a long, slender, reddish-brown monster. Its skin is mottled yellow across its back, tapering off as the colors near its head. Its mouth is huge and lined with rock hard teeth that allow it to break rocks and earth as it burrows underground.

Name: Death Worm
Description: This creature is a long, slender, reddish-brown monster. Its skin is mottled yellow across its back, tapering off as the colors near its head. Its mouth is huge and lined with rock hard teeth that allow it to break rocks and earth as it burrows underground.

Name: Decapus
Description: This creature is a large spheroid with ten octopus-like tentacles protruding from its body. Hair grows in broken patches along its body. Its eyes are stark white and pupil-less. Its large mouth sports long, yellow fangs.

Name: Deep Hunter Sea Serpent
Description: The serpent is about 60 feet long and 10 feet thick. Its body scales are smooth, each about the size of a large shield, and the entire serpent is deep green to jet black in color, with eyes a solid, nearly black red color.

Name: Deep Sea Serpent
Description: This enormous, water-dwelling serpent has bright, bulging eyes and rounded jaws filled with long, jagged teeth.

Name: Deer
Description: The elegant creature raises it head revealing a majestic rack of antlers. It has a tawny brown hide and small black hooves.

Name: Defender Globe
Description: This small glowing orb radiates light similar to that of a lantern. Small filaments of electrical energy dance across its illuminated surface.

Name: Deinosuchus
Description: This immense reptile, an alligator of overwhelming size, emerges from the water with rapidly snapping jaws that grind menacingly between each bite.

Name: Delver
Description: This fleshy, slug-like creature has two long pseudopods that end in lumps of hard, callused flesh, and its whole body sizzles with acidic slime as it slides forward through melting stone.

Name: Demonic Deadfall Scorpion
Description: This over-sized vermin bears demonic features and the unmistakable glint of intelligence in its eyes.

Name: Demonic Knight
Description: This creature appears as a man-sized humanoid dressed in black iron armor. Its head is completely hidden behind a dull black helm.

Name: Denizen of Leng
Description: This creature appears human at first glance, but has hooves instead of feet, furred legs, small horns, and an unsettlingly wide mouth.

Name: Derghodaemon
Description: This creature is a tall, bloated, insect-like creature with five arms and three legs. Each of its arms ends in a sharpened, clawed hand. Its legs end in four-toed feet. Its flesh is mottled green and black and its eyes are large and black with no pupils.

Name: Derghodaemon
Description: This creature is a tall, bloated, insect-like creature with five arms and three legs. Each of its arms ends in a sharpened, clawed hand. Its legs end in four-toed feet. Its flesh is mottled green and black and its eyes are large and black with no pupils.

Name: Derhii
Description: Powerful black wings beat from the back of this large ape, which carries a wickedly curved sword in its simian hands.

Name: Derro
Description: This pale blue humanoid has bulging white eyes, wild hair, four-fingered hands, and a large hooked club.

Name: Desert Drake
Description: This sleek dragon has scales mottled in desert colors, lacks forelimbs, and sports massive wings on its lissome back.

Name: Desert Giant
Description: Loose robes conceal the sand-etched features of this lanky giant. In each hand he grips a scimitar nearly the length of a human.

Name: Destrachan
Description: The hunched, reptilian beast lopes on two clawed feet, its eyeless head dominated by a huge circular maw filled with jagged teeth.

Name: Devil Dog
Description: This creature resembles a large wolf with frost white fur and glowing blue eyes.

Name: Dimetrodon
Description: The massive sail on the back of this squat reptilian creature flexes and twitches as the beast stalks forward.

Name: Dimorphodon
Description: A brightly colored creature swoops down to land on the branch above. Its head is overly large, with a mouth full of sharp teeth and bright, shiny eyes. The thing chirps, lashes its long thin tail, and then with a flap of leathery wings is in the air once again.

Name: Diplodocus
Description: This enormous, long-necked quadruped moves with an uncanny grace, holding its lengthy, whip-like tail out level behind it.

Name: Dire Bat
Description: This giant, furry bat is nearly the size of an ox, with dark leathery wings that open wider than two men with arms outstretched.

Name: Dire Corby
Description: This creature looks like a humanoid crow with oily black feathers, glittering eyes, and a sharp beak. In the place of wings, it instead has two muscular arms, ending in sharp claws as hard as rocks.

Name: Dire Corby
Description: This creature looks like a humanoid crow with oily black feathers, glittering eyes, and a sharp beak. In the place of wings, it instead has two muscular arms, ending in sharp claws as hard as rocks.

Name: Dire Racoon
Description: This animal is about the size of a large dog. Its fur is brownish-grey, and its bushy tail is ringed in black. Its paws and ears are black as well, and it has a black and white mask-like marking on its face.

Name: Dire Shark (Megalodon)
Description: Large as a dragon, this shark’s jaws open to reveal a cavernous, tooth-lined gullet capable of swallowing a horse whole.

Name: Dire Smilodon
Description: With fangs like swords, this cat’s gleaming eyes and wicked claws promise death to anything it sees as prey.

Name: Dire Weasel
Description: This brown-furred creature’s slender body bounds forth in a loping gate, mouth open wide and filled with dozens of sharp teeth.

Name: Dire Wolf
Description: This immense black wolf is the size of a horse, its fangs as large and sharp as knives.

Name: Disenchanter
Description: This creature resembles a massive blue furred camel with slightly translucent skin and a long snout that ends in a suction-like cup.

Name: Disenchanter
Description: This creature resembles a massive blue furred camel with slightly translucent skin and a long snout that ends in a suction-like cup.

Name: Divine Guardian Hydra
Description: This regal hydra has one larger head and four smaller ones, and projects an aura of authority and menace.

Name: Djinni
Description: This creature stands nearly twice as tall as a human, although its lower torso trails away into a vortex of mist and wind.

Name: Dodo
Description: This plump, gray, flightless bird waddles about on ungainly legs, fearlessly bobbing its prodigious beak.

Name: Dog
Description: This small dog has a rough coat and a hungry look in its dark brown eyes.

Name: Domovoi
Description: Barely knee-high, this small creature looks like a hairy old man with more beard than flesh.

Name: Domovoi
Description: Barely knee-high, this small creature looks like a hairy old man with more beard than flesh.

Name: Doru
Description: This disembodied and bestial head covered in lashing hair and curling horns flies through the air.

Name: Dorvae
Description: Two pairs of stretched and veiny leather wings adorn the back of this shrouded reptilian nightmare.

Name: Dossenus
Description: This small creature looks like a lumpy head with crab legs and a giant mouth filled with stone teeth.

Name: Dracolisk
Description: This creature resembles a young six-legged dragon with glistening scales and gleaming eyes.

Name: Dracolisk
Description: This creature resembles a young six-legged dragon with glistening scales and gleaming eyes.

Name: Draconal
Description: This noble creature seems to be part serpent, part humanoid, and part dragon, with great wings and a crown of horns.

Name: Draconid
Description: This hideous creature looks like a cross between a giant spider and dragon or hydra. Where its head should be, two long serpentine necks sprout from its body. Its head and neck are scaled gray, and its spidery torso and eight knobbed legs are covered in short, coarse fur.

Name: Dragonfish
Description: This small flat fish has brown scales mottled with black. A series of needle-like spines runs the length of the fish on its dorsal side.

Name: Dragonkin
Description: This sleek, gold-scaled draconic creature looks both regal and intelligent. A leather harness holds a saddle between its wings.

Name: Dragonne
Description: This creature has the features of a lion but the wings and scales of a brass dragon, and a wild mane matching its scales.

Name: Dragonnel
Description: This creature looks like a great dragon, at least 20 feet long with a serpentine body, long slender wings and a pointed snout or beak that resembles that of a pteranodon. Its body is colored reddish-violet with lighter shades on its underbelly. A ridge of maroon-colored spines runs the length of its body down the center of its back. A mane of frills, white in color, rings its head.

Name: Drakainia
Description: This woman’s upper body is shapely and beautiful, but her lower body is bloated, with pulsating tumors and writhing tentacles.

Name: Dretch
Description: This creature’s bloated frame shudders with each heaving step, yet despite its shape, the thing moves with surprising quickness.

Name: Drowning Devil
Description: Frail, fin-like wings erupt from the back of this serpentine creature, whose head resembles that of a ram-horned, four-eyed fish, and whose muscular arms end in masses of writhing tentacles like fists made of sea anemones.

Name: Dryad

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This strange, beautiful woman has flesh that seems made of wood and vibrant hair that resembles leaves and blossoms.

Name: Duergar

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Shortspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A shortspear is about 3 feet in length, making it a suitable thrown weapon.

Description: This bald, long-bearded dwarf has dull gray skin, low arching brows, and eyes that seem to absorb rather than reflect the light.

Name: Dunkleosteus
Description: This gigantic, prehistoric fish has a head like a snapping turtle, complete with sharp, toothlike plates.

Name: Dust Digger
Description: This creature looks like a man-sized sandy brown starfish with five long tentacles ringing a central maw lined with sharpened teeth and fangs.

Name: Dvorovoi
Description: A wild mop of hair tops this small humanoid creature’s head. It has prominent gleaming eyes and a toothy grin.

Name: Dwarf Caiman
Description: This lithe, green-scaled reptile looks like a miniature crocodile with a stunted muzzle.

Name: Dweomercat
Description: Its coat shining vividly, this majestic tiger looks exotic and otherworldly. It gazes with piercing yellow eyes and stands calmly, as though fearless.

Name: Dweomercat Cub
Description: Its coat shining vividly, this majestic cat looks exotic and otherworldly. It gazes with piercing yellow eyes and stands calmly, as though fearless.

Name: Dwiergeth
Description: This beast’s bulbous body perches atop four sucker-ended, multijointed legs, and possesses two gnashing, ophidian maws.

Name: Eblis
Description: This creature appears to be about 8 feet tall and strongly resembles a stork. Its feathers are gray-brown and its beak is dark brown. Its eyes are golden in color.

Name: Ebon Ooze
Description: This is a jet-black, loathsome mass in a roughly spherical shape that slithers forward with a wet slurping sound.

Name: Efreeti
Description: This muscular giant has crimson skin, smoldering eyes, and small black horns. Smoke rises in curls from its flesh.

Name: Einherji
Description: Holding a massive battleaxe and shield, this tall, helmed warrior is grim and fierce.

Name: Elder Earth Elemental
Description: This hulking, roughly humanoid creature of dirt and stone explodes up from the earth, faceless save for two glowing gemstone eyes.

Name: Elder Fire Elemental
Description: This creature looks like a living, mobile bonfire, tongues of flame reaching out in search of things to burn.

Name: Elder Water Elemental
Description: This translucent creature’s shape shifts between a spinning column of water and a crashing wave.

Name: Electric Eel
Description: The serpentine creature moves sinuously through the water, the tip of its tail sparking with an electrical discharge.

Name: Electric Eel
Description: The serpentine creature moves sinuously through the water, the tip of its tail sparking with an electrical discharge.

Name: Elemental Air Dragon
Description: This massive creature resembles a huge dragon composed of air and vapor. Its great wings are translucent and look like wisps of smoke. Its eyes are hollow sockets of mist though a glint of bright sunlight can occasionally be seen dancing across the surface. Its great tail appears as wisps of smoke or vapor and seems to trail off into nothingness.

Name: Elemental Earth Dragon
Description: This creature resembles a 30-foot long dragon composed of stone and earth. Its great wings glisten like polished stone. Its eyes are deep gray and its roar seems to shake the very earth itself.

Name: Elemental Fire Dragon
Description: This creature appears as a 30-foot long dragon composed of fire. Its eyes burn with a white-hot flame and flames lick the dragon’s great mouth as it roars. As it flies overhead, its wings send sheets of flame roaring into the sky and crashing into the ground.

Name: Elemental Water Dragon
Description: This creature resembles a massive dragon composed entirely of water. Its wings slosh and drip water as it moves them. Its great mouth opens into a maw of inky darkness. Water drips from its fangs.

Name: Elephant
Description: These thick-skinned animals bear large ivory tusks flanking a long, prehensile snout.

Name: Elk
Description: This majestic beast stands the height of a man at its shoulders, a many-tipped rack of proud antlers crowning its head.

Name: Elohim
Description: This one-eyed being is a strange mix of insects, fungi, and other living things shaped into a single winged entity.

Name: Elusa Hound
Description: This powerful wolf-like dog has coarse white fur and pale white skin, and a short, bushy tail. Its eyes are a sickly yellow in color and its teeth are bone white.

Name: Elysian Titan
Description: This titanic humanoid wears gilt-edged armor of ancient make and carries an immense hammer made of gleaming metal.

Name: Emperor Walrus
Description: Thick folds of skin protect this massive sea mammal like fleshy armor. Tusks as tall as humans jut from its whiskered face.

Name: Empyreal
Description: This creature resembles a man-sized column of white fire. Within the burning fires seems to be a winged humanoid-shaped creature dressed in shining armor.

Name: Encephalon Gorger
Description: This creature is a sleek, pale-skinned humanoid with leathery white, semi-translucent flesh. It is a bit taller than an average human. Its features are delicate and precise. The creature’s arms and legs are spindly, and each ends in four digits. This creature is completely hairless and its eyes are small, with nictitating membranes.

Name: Erlking
Description: Birdlike wings covered with autumnal leaves instead of feathers extend from the back of this regal, elf-like humanoid.

Name: Erodaemon
Description: This blue-skinned woman has ram’s horns, a third eye in her forehead, and a long, scaled tail that ends in a hissing viper’s head.

Name: Ethereal Rat
Description: This creature is a large grayish-black rat about 2 feet long.

Name: Ettercap
Description: This hideous purple creature walks upright like a man, but its face is that of a spider, and its hands are sickle-shaped claws.

Name: Euryale
Description: This creature has the upper body of a woman, the lower body of a snake, and a mass of undulating cobras for hair.

Name: Eye Killer
Description: This man-sized creature looks like a cross between a bat and a snake. Its upper torso resembles that of a large black bat while its lower torso appears to be that of a green and yellow scaled snake. Dark green fur covers its upper body. Its eyes are large, lidless white circles and are without pupils.

Name: Faceless Whale
Description: A deep groan at the edge of hearing precedes the appearance of this sightless leviathan, whose pallid body breaks the surface of dark waters without as much as a ripple.

Name: Fachen
Description: This half-bodied monstrosity with an overly wide mouth and stringy hair hops about on a single leg, balancing in defiance of its awkward physical form. A single arm—centered on the creature’s torso and formed of tightly corded muscle—and single eye round out the being’s features.

Name: Fanged Sea Serpent
Description: This serpent is 12 to 15 feet long and 5 feet thick. Its body scales are thickened and hardened, which slows it somewhat in water but provides good protection. The serpent’s most outstanding features, however, are the rows of long, sharp teeth that fill its mouth. It has large, lidless red eyes with white pupils.

Name: Fen Witch
Description: This creature appears as a female humanoid with one nostril, webbed feet and hands, and fiery red eyes. Her body is cloaked in tattered robes of gray or brown. Her hands end in razor-sharp claws and her hair is usually long and unkempt.

Name: Fey Giant Toad
Description: Little about this enormous toad is ordinary, from its graceful wings to its colorful purple and pink skin to its bright, shining eyes.

Name: Fey Wolverine
Description: This wolverine’s eyes possess the unmistakable glint of intelligence, and its mouth seems to twitch as if it were about to laugh.

Name: Fire Drake
Description: This creature appears to be a small, red dragon with translucent scales, mottled mauve and burgundy. Heat and steam rise from its body. Its wings are mottled black and its eyes are crimson.

Name: Fire Giant
Description: This lumbering giant has short stumpy legs and powerful, muscular arms. Its hair and beard seem to be made of fire.

Name: Fire Lizard
Description: This creature resembles a wingless red dragon. Its scales are gray and dappled in red and brown along its back. Its underbelly is bright red and its eyes are black with yellow pupils.

Name: Fire Nymph

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This creature appears as a very attractive and beautiful female with long, flowing fiery-red hair. Her eyes are pale blue and her skin is lightly colored with a cinnamon hint to it.

Name: Fire Snake
Description: This creature looks like a snake with reddish-orange scales and stark white eyes without pupils.

Name: Fire Whale
Description: Waves of searing heat ripple from the stony, gem-encrusted hide of this enormous whalelike beast.

Name: Fire Yai
Description: This fanged, three-eyed giant rages in its finely crafted armor, its skin as red as a smoldering ember.

Name: Firebird
Description: This proud bird has the bearing of a peacock, made all the more majestic by its flaming fan of feathers, which shift through the color spectrum.

Name: Fjord Linnorm
Description: This massive, eel-like dragon has two webbed talons. Its tail ends in large and powerful-looking flukes.

Name: Flail Snail
Description: This enormous snail has a brightly colored shell and four tentacles on its head, each tipped with a mace-like club.

Name: Flail Snail
Description: This enormous snail has a brightly colored shell and four tentacles on its head, each tipped with a mace-like club.

Name: Flame Drake
Description: This ferocious creature looks like a red-and-yellow scaled dragon, but with only two legs.

Name: Fleshdreg
Description: Composed of half-formed body parts, this creature stands on two monstrous legs. A mouth full of jagged teeth dominates the creature’s bulbous head. Its veins pulse just beneath transparent flesh.

Name: Fleshdreg Swarm
Description: Hundreds of wads of squirming flesh with flailing appendages move together in a cluster of teeth and claws.

Name: Flind
Description: This creature resembles a bipedal-like humanoid with dusky russet and brown fur. Its eyes are yellow and it wears dented and battleworn scaled armor.

Name: Floating Eye
Description: This creature looks like a 6-inch long semi-transparent fish with a single large eye located in the center of its body along its dorsal region.

Name: Flumph
Description: This small strange creature looks like a saucer-shaped jellyfish with many small spike-like tentacles dangling from its underbelly. Its body is milky-white in color. Two short eyestalks protrude from the top of its body. Its eyestalks are gray as are its tentacles. Its eyes are jet black.

Name: Flumph
Description: This small strange creature looks like a saucer-shaped jellyfish with many small spike-like tentacles dangling from its underbelly. Its body is milky-white in color. Two short eyestalks protrude from the top of its body. Its eyestalks are gray as are its tentacles. Its eyes are jet black.

Name: Flying Squirrel
Description: Although not capable of actual flight, a flying squirrel possesses a furry membrane stretching between its wrists and ankles, allowing it to glide for long distances.

Name: Fomorian Titan
Description: This godlike giant wears armor made of thick plates of blackened iron and wields a great bladed mace.

Name: Foo Dog
Description: This man-sized dog has a slightly oversized head and large, bulbous eyes. Its paws end in sharp claws. Its fur is golden fading to crimson on the underside.

Name: Forest Drake
Description: This green-scaled dragon has two powerful legs and a pair of long, leathery wings. A long spike adorns its thrashing tail.

Name: Forgotten One
Description: This is a small 1-foot tall creature with pointed ears, slanted eyes, and long lithe limbs. Its hair is brightly colored and decorated with leaves and twigs and it is dressed in greenish-brown clothes. It carries a tiny spear in its hands.

Name: Forlarren
Description: This creature resembles a hairless satyr. A small ruff of dark hair covers the back of its head. Small horns protrude above its eyes. Its hands end in wicked claws and its face shows a twisted, leering visage.

Name: Forlarren
Description: This creature resembles a hairless satyr. A small ruff of dark hair covers the back of its head. Small horns protrude above its eyes. Its hands end in wicked claws and its face shows a twisted, leering visage.

Name: Formian Myrmarch
Description: This horse-sized insect has a brilliant red carapace, and its monstrous face reflects great intelligence and confidence.

Name: Formian Queen
Description: This large and majestic creature is nearly immobile, her massive abdomen swollen with her impending brood.

Name: Formian Taskmaster
Description: This centaurlike creature is equipped with an ant’s mandibles and antennae.

Name: Formian Warrior
Description: Armored from head to toe in gleaming black-and-red chitin, this insectile warrior’s tail ends in a wickedly barbed stinger.

Name: Formian Worker
Description: This small, centaurlike ant creature bears a huge, bulging sack on its armored back.

Name: Fossegrim
Description: This striking, blue-eyed man with luminous skin and flowing white hair holds an ethereal harp.

Name: Fox
Description: The small, red-furred creature has an inquisitive face and large ears. It slinks silently through the brush as it stalks its prey.

Name: Fox
Description: The small, red-furred creature has an inquisitive face and large ears. It slinks silently through the brush as it stalks its prey.

Name: Froghemoth
Description: This gigantic creature resembles a giant frog with 4 large tentacles in place of its front legs. A single eyestalk juts from the top of its head. Its underbelly is yellow, its body is green, and its tentacles and legs are mottled green.

Name: Froghemoth
Description: This gigantic creature resembles a giant frog with 4 large tentacles in place of its front legs. A single eyestalk juts from the top of its head. Its underbelly is yellow, its body is green, and its tentacles and legs are mottled green.

Name: Frost Drake
Description: This two-legged dragon has dull blue scales tinged with bright blue ice. A freezing mist issues from between its powerful jaws.

Name: Frost Man

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: This creature appears to be a human dressed in loosely fitting animal skins and furs. It wears a patch over one eye and its hair is long and unkempt. A short, rough beard of dark hair covers its jaw.

Name: Frost Worm
Description: This immense white worm has a single circular eye in the center of its head. Wisps of icy fog waft up from between its mandibles.

Name: Fungal Nymph
Description: Mushroom caps and mold sprout from the pallid skin of this lithe female figure, and spores waft from her fungal gills.

Name: Fungoid
Description: This tall, stocky and powerful humanoid seems formed of mushroom flesh. Its rough facial features are crudely discernible and its arms end in oversized hands.

Name: Fungus Gargoyle
Description: This creature looks like a winged statue, humanoid in shape, carved from molds, fungi, and mushrooms. Its arms and legs end in clawed hands and feet, and its mouth is lined with fangs carved from the same substances its body is.

Name: Fungus Leshy
Description: Mismatched eyes dot this plant creature’s thick mushroom cap, while below works an overlarge maw set with pale fungal teeth.

Name: Fungus Man
Description: These small, non-aggressive plant-men appear to be mobile toadstools, with brightly colored caps, stubby arms and thick, trunk-like legs. They do not speak, but they hold up their hands in a sign of peace or supplication.

Name: Fungus Queen
Description: This eerie creature has the upper body of a beautiful, pale green woman, but her lower body is a pulsating mound of fungus.

Name: Fungus Weird
Description: This creature appears to be a large serpent formed of fungus, plants, and tangled vines. As it moves toward you, it flicks its vine-like tongue and sways back and forth.

Name: Fyr
Description: This small, goat-headed humanoid has large backward curving horns, goat-like legs, a small bushy tail, and a human torso. Except its arms and hands, thick brown fur covers its entire body. It is heavily adorned with rings, necklaces, bracelets, earrings, and other such trinkets.

Name: Galvo
Description: This creature is constantly crackling with blue energy, and appears to be composed of dozens of undulating electric eels tightly knotted into a slithering, humanoid shape.

Name: Gambado
Description: A dull white humanoid skull lies on the ground in a tangle of sticks, leaves, and twigs.

Name: Gar
Description: This long, lean fish has a muscular body and a head with long jaws filled with sharp teeth.

Name: Gare Linnorm
Description: An enormous draconic head rises up atop a massive serpentine neck wider than a galleon’s mainmast. Seemingly endless coils break the water’s surface around it, only hinting at the monster’s terrifying size, as it opens its steam-shrouded maw with a hiss.

Name: Gargiya
Description: With burning eyes and a snapping maw, this blood-red serpent rises from the ocean’s depths. Sweltering heat radiates from its rippling scales.

Name: Gargoyle
Description: Seemingly carved from a dark gray stone, this sinister crouching humanoid resembles a horned, winged demon.

Name: Garipan
Description: Bat-like wings stretch behind this stone-faced creature with a wide, wild grin and fierce red eyes. The molten core in the creature’s torso glows through rugged cracks in its dark stone skin.

Name: Garuda
Description: This winged creature has clawed hands and bird’s talons. Large, glinting eyes and a serrated beak dominate its avian face.

Name: Gathlain
Description: Wings composed of wood and vines grow out of the body of this lithesome fey.

Name: Genthodaemon
Description: Jagged bits of metal, armor, and sharp pieces of wire embed the flesh of this towering fiend.

Name: Geon
Description: An immense boulder-like creature emerges from the earth. It props itself upon two large legs and feet, which also seem to serve as the creatures hands. Two large recesses on its surface function as eyes and its moth stretches wide.

Name: Geryon
Description: This tripartite being has three humanoid bodies engulfed from the waist down by a tangle of three immense serpents.

Name: Ghaddar Devil
Description: This massive creature stands almost three times as tall as a human and has the head of a donkey. It shuffles with a hunched gait as it moves. Large downward-curving horns protrude from its head. Its body is covered with blackish hair. Its feet are splayed and its eyes are stark white with hollow black pupils.

Name: Ghawwas
Description: Bristling with spiny ridges, coral horns, and needle-sharp teeth, this menacing biped seems to have emerged from some poisoned sea.

Name: Ghonhatine
Description: Even hunched and creeping upon all fours, this reptilian behemoth towers over its prey, its protruding teeth snapping wildly.

Name: Ghoran
Description: The humanoid creature’s taut green shell extends like a cowl from chin to brow, wreathing a face of brilliant flower petals.

Name: Ghorazagh
Description: With an armored spherical body, numerous tentacular legs, and a multi-eyed visage, this creature is truly hideous.

Name: Giant Abyssal Dire Frog
Description: This frog appears to be about 12 feet long. Its skin is blackish-green and constantly oozes a milky slime from its body.

Name: Giant Barracuda
Description: This fish is long and bluish gray fading to mottled silver near it tail. It has an oversized jaw full of sharp teeth.

Name: Giant Blowfish
Description: A blowfish the size of a horse drifts through the water, its quills the size of spears.

Name: Giant Bog Turtle
Description: This giant turtle has a brownish-green carapace mottled with black splotches. Its head, neck, and limbs are dark green and leathery. Its eyes are pale yellow.

Name: Giant Caribe
Description: This fish resembles a massive piranha with a jaw bearing rows of razor-like teeth.

Name: Giant Chameleon
