Description: This giant lizard has a pebbly hide and eyes that protrude from the sides of its head such that they appear to be capable of independent movement.

Name: Giant Chameleon
Description: This giant lizard has a pebbly hide and eyes that protrude from the sides of its head such that they appear to be capable of independent movement.

Name: Giant Dire Frog
Description: This frog appears to be at least 10 feet long. It resembles a feral amphibian with dark mottled skin and black splotches on its body.

Name: Giant Electric Catfish
Description: A wide mouthed goggle-eyed fish with slippery grey skin and a puffy, bloated body.

Name: Giant Falcon
Description: The raptor swoops through the air with grace and power, a perfect predator.

Name: Giant Flytrap
Description: A large cluster of vines covered in barbs appears to have a series of thorny mouths in its center.

Name: Giant Frog
Description: This creature is a larger version of a frog. It has razor-sharp teeth lining its mouth.

Name: Giant Frog
Description: This creature is a larger version of a frog. It has razor-sharp teeth lining its mouth.

Name: Giant Gecko
Description: With large bulging eyes to spot prey from afar, this oversized, smooth-scaled lizard has splayed, padded feet and a toothy maw.

Name: Giant Hamster
Description: What should be a tiny, cuddly creature is instead a behemoth of tan fur and over-sized teeth. Its eyes gleam with a feral intensity.

Name: Giant Moray Eel
Description: This creature looks like an 8-foot long eel with yellowish-brown splotches on its back.

Name: Giant Moray Eel
Description: This creature looks like an 8-foot long eel with yellowish-brown splotches on its back.

Name: Giant Octopus
Description: A storm of tentacles, each twenty feet in length, flails with deadly precision from the leathery body of this gigantic octopus.

Name: Giant Owl
Description: This enormous owl has a silent gracefulness and wisdom about it despite its considerable size.

Name: Giant Pike
Description: This fish is long and slender with light spots along its body and a tooth-filled maw.

Name: Giant Sea Slug
Description: Surfacing from the depths emerges a colossal slug. Its swollen flesh is a hideous mottled greenish-gray and rows of undulating gills line its 30- foot long body. Probing with a large set of antennae it gnashes its great mouth exposing a gullet lined with rows and rows of serrated teeth.

Name: Giant Sea Snake
Description: This great, writhing aquatic beast is pale blue with bright yellow stripes, and possesses a flipper-like tail to aid it as it swims.

Name: Giant Seahorse
Description: This aquatic creature resembles an ordinary seahorse with a vaguely equine-shaped head, fins emerging from the base of its head and a curling tail but it extends to a length of 8 feet or more.

Name: Giant Seahorse
Description: This aquatic creature resembles an ordinary seahorse with a vaguely equine-shaped head, fins emerging from the base of its head and a curling tail but it extends to a length of 8 feet or more.

Name: Giant Skunk
Description: Snarling and ferocious, this horse-sized skunk emits a frightening growl as it smashes through the undergrowth.

Name: Giant Snapping Turtle
Description: This is a turtle of massive proportions, its shell an impenetrable coat of armor, and its snapping jaws capable of dismembering its prey.

Name: Giant Snapping Turtle
Description: This is a turtle of massive proportions, its shell an impenetrable coat of armor, and its snapping jaws capable of dismembering its prey.

Name: Giant Tortoise
Description: This tortoise is half the height of a human, and has a domed shell, leathery skin, and a long neck.

Name: Giant Tuatara
Description: This reptile has a beak like upper jaw, a long narrow body and is covered in hard scales and short spines running along its back.

Name: Giant Vulture
Description: A wickedly hooked beak and an immense bald head draw attention from this enormous scavenger’s vast wingspan.

Name: Giant Weasel
Description: The predatory nature of this wolf-sized creature is revealed by its long teeth, sleekly muscular body, and belligerent hiss.

Name: Gibbering Abomination
Description: A horrifying expanse of fused faces and parts of faces, the gibbering abomination is the result of foul arcane experiments studying the creation of chimerical creatures.

Name: Gibbering Orb
Description: These great masses of floating amorphous flesh appear to be covered in bloodshot, weeping eyes and disgustingly vile mouths. The gibbering orb is a pulsing mass of sickly greyish-green flesh, roughly 20 ft. in diameter. The orb distends and undulates as it flies, seeming to spasm through the air rather than fly. The creature does not seem to have a top or bottom, nor does it have any form of appendages for handling objects.

Name: Gigas Clam
Description: This monstrous clam’s conjoined shells open wide enough to swallow a horse. Inside, two tubular siphons flank the thing’s innards, which resemble a fleshy, vaguely humanoid woman, save that instead of a face, it has a singular massive maw filled with rows of ravenous teeth.

Name: Gilded Sea Serpent
Description: This serpent is about 8 feet long and 2 feet thick. Its body scales are small and smooth, with the brilliant luster of gold. It has a long, narrow crocodilian snout and a cluster of antenna-like whiskers sweeping back from just above its jaws.

Name: Gillman
Description: A handsome, well-formed man walks out of the waves, the gill slits on the side of his neck flexing.

Name: Giraffe
Description: This animal, covered in a spotted pattern, has a disproportionately long neck that allows it to tower over other animals.

Name: Girallon
Description: This four-armed, gorilla-like creature, covered with matted white fur, roars in rage as it rears up to its full, towering height.

Name: Girtablilu
Description: The body of a spear-wielding woman rises from the front of this monstrously huge scorpion.

Name: Glabrezu
Description: Four arms grace the torso of this towering monstrosity. The monster’s eyes shine with a mix of intelligence and cruelty.

Name: Glacier Toad
Description: This improbably large toad has pale blue flesh and a body covered with jagged, icy growths.

Name: Glass Wyrm
Description: This creature appears to be formed of crystal or glass. Its scales are semi-transparent and appear razor-sharp. Its head is angular with two blade-like horns swept back across its crown. A glass fin-like crest starts near the base of its skull, runs down the center of its back and tapers off as it reaches the monster’s tail. Its large wings are translucent and the sound of grating glass can be heard as the beast moves.

Name: Gloom Crawler
Description: This giant, squid-like beast has thirty to forty tentacles, each about 30 feet long. At the end of each tentacle stares a small, round, lidless eye with a stark blue pupil. The creature’s glossy flesh is inky-black with a slightly paler underside centered upon a vicious looking, monstrouslysized, hooked beak.

Name: Gloomwing
Description: This creature looks like a giant moth. Its body and wings are black with spiraled patterns of silver. Two large black antennae protrude from its head. Eight legs run the length of its body, each ending in a pearly-white claw. Its mouth has two large pearly-white mandibles.

Name: Gloomwing
Description: This creature looks like a giant moth. Its body and wings are black with spiraled patterns of silver. Two large black antennae protrude from its head. Eight legs run the length of its body, each ending in a pearly-white claw. Its mouth has two large pearly-white mandibles.

Name: Gnarlwood
Description: This creature resembles a treant but instead of the kindly, gentle face of the tree-folk its face is twisted into a grim scowl. Its deep-set eyes and jagged mouth give it an almost skull-like grimace and its four twisted arms are tipped in sharp woody claws. Its leaves are deep green, almost black, and have ghostly white markings on them. Behind it, the skeletal remains of unfortunate animals shamble through the undergrowth.

Name: Gnasher Lizard
Description: This 10-foot long stone-colored lizard has a large, wide gaping maw filled with double rows of dagger-like teeth. Its head is large and flat and sports a ridge of hardened bone that runs the length of its head before tapering off near the middle of its back. Its four legs end in large, flat clawed feet.

Name: Gnoll
Description: Hunched and feral, this furred, hyena-headed humanoid stands slightly taller than the average human.

Name: Goblin
Description: This creature stands barely three feet tall, its scrawny, humanoid body dwarfed by its wide, ungainly head.

Name: Goblin Snake
Description: A gray, lipless goblin head with serpent’s fangs sits atop the sinuous black body of this greasy-scaled snake.

Name: Golden Cat
Description: This marvelous creature appears as a small housecat with sleek golden fur and glowing emerald eyes.

Name: Gongorinan
Description: This human-sized, crab-like creature scuttles on six stumpy legs, and each of its four arms sports a different method of inflicting pain.

Name: Gorbel
Description: This bizarre creature is a small orb with reddish skin. Atop its round body are six eyestalks, each ending in a sapphire-colored eye. Dangling beneath its body are two stubby legs that end in claws.

Name: Gorgimera
Description: This hideous creature has leathery dragon wings and three heads; a lion, a dragon, and a gorgon. Its hindquarters are that of a gorgon and its forequarters are that of a great lion.

Name: Gorgon
Description: This bull-like creature seems to be made of interlocking metallic plates. Faint plumes of green smoke puff from its mouth.

Name: Gorilla
Description: Large, deep-set eyes peer from beneath this great ape’s thick brow as it lumbers forward on its legs and knuckles.

Name: Gorilla Bear
Description: This creature resembles a massive gorilla with shaggy dark fur and the forepaws of a powerful bear. Its head appears to be a cross between a gorilla and bear.

Name: Gorynych
Description: This sleek, three-headed dragon rears up on its hind legs, wings spread and flames licking out from behind three sets of fangs.

Name: Gourd Leshy
Description: This little plant man walks on legs like tangled vines and has a pumpkin carved with eyes and a mouth for a head.

Name: Graeae
Description: Haggard and hunched, this blind and snaggle-toothed crone guides herself by a gruesomely bloated eyeball she clutches in her claws.

Name: Gray Nisp
Description: This creature resembles a hairless humanoid with smooth, slick skin; its hands and feet are webbed and end in claws, and its face has large, dark pupilless eyes. It has no noses or ears, and its small fish-like mouth is filled with tiny, sharp teeth.

Name: Gray Render
Description: This hulking beast has slick, gray, hairless skin. Its numerous yellow eyes and wide toothy maw are its only facial features.

Name: Great Cyclops
Description: This misshapen but incredibly muscular humanoid has a single huge bloodshot eye set under a short, jagged horn on its brow.

Name: Great White Shark
Description: This immense silvery beast oozes strength, power, and speed. Its gigantic maw is lined with rows of ragged-looking teeth, and its pitch-black, emotionless eyes give nothing away.

Name: Great Wyrm Blue Dragon
Description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

Name: Great Wyrm Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Great Wyrm Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Great Wyrm White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Greater Basilisk
Description: This creature looks like a thick-bodied reptile with eight legs. Its eyes glow with an eerie, pale green incandescence.

Name: Greater Fire Elemental
Description: This creature looks like a living, mobile bonfire, tongues of flame reaching out in search of things to burn.

Name: Greater Gelid Beetle
Description: A massive stark white beetle with silvery-black legs hungrily raises its dull silver mandibles. Equally spaced on the creature’s head stare two sets of dull silvery-black eyes.

Name: Greater Gravity Elemental
Description: This creature resembles a miniature black hole hovering several feet off the ground. It is a circular region of absolute blackness, with a bizarre distortion around its edges as it warps light waves. Four spiraling, rotating arms of debris and light surround the circular region of darkness. Its facial features are small points of light, almost like stars.

Name: Greater Negative Energy Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a shimmering and wavering sphere of translucent gray energy with small motes of light winking in and out of existence along its spherical form.

Name: Greater Ooze Demon
Description: This creature stands about 8 feet tall. Its head is crocodilian with razorsharp teeth, and its humanoid body appears as an oozy and swirling black mass.

Name: Greater Positive Energy Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a shimmering and wavering sphere of brilliant white energy with small motes of light winking in and out of existence along its spherical form.

Name: Greater Water Elemental
Description: This translucent creature’s shape shifts between a spinning column of water and a crashing wave.

Name: Green Hag
Description: Knots of dark, moldering hair spill over the features of this sickly, thin, green-skinned crone.

Name: Gremlin
Description: This creature resembles a goblin with long floppy ears, a pinched wrinkled face, nasty claws, a mouth full of sharp teeth and a wicked glint to its eyes.

Name: Grendel
Description: This lurching hulk carries no weapons, but its eyes burn with menace, and its long claws are caked with blood.

Name: Grick
Description: This pallid, slimy, worm-like creature is the size of a human, its mouth a sickening tangle of tentacles and hooked jaws.

Name: Griffon
Description: This majestic beast has the body of a lion, the head and forelegs of a great eagle, and a massive pair of feathered wings.

Name: Grig
Description: Perched on the prickly legs of a cricket, this tiny creature has gossamer wings and the upper body of an elven woman.

Name: Grig Swarm
Description: Winged man-shaped creatures with blue skin and cricket legs buzz about in a dense mass both hypnotic and frightening.

Name: Grimlock
Description: A muscular humanoid stares with dark, eyeless sockets. It fingers a notched batleaxe and emits a low growl.

Name: Grimm
Description: This monstrous beast stands well over 9 feet tall and has glistening black flesh. Its head is oval with deep sunken black eyes. Its mouth is wide and large and sports double rows of razor-sharp fangs. A purplish-black tongue flicks in and out of its mouth. The monster’s powerful arms and legs end in filthy wicked claws that sport broken, black fingernails.

Name: Grimple
Description: This putrid-looking humanoid bears a disquieting resemblance to a half-starved, mange-ridden opossum.

Name: Grimslake
Description: This maggotlike creature has a long tail covered with frightening hooked suckers.

Name: Grimstalker
Description: This creature looks like a hairless elf, slender and graceful, with long arms that end in sharp claws. Its skin is brown and woody and resembles tree bark. It wears clothes made of leaves and vines.

Name: Grindylow
Description: With a large head and numerous teeth, this unsightly creature resembles a goblin from the waist up and a greasy octopus below.

Name: Grioth
Description: This silent batlike humanoid has a long, ratlike tail and four narrow eyes.

Name: Grippli
Description: This creature looks like a bipedal tree frog, smaller than a halfling, and with humanoid arms and hands in place of its forelimbs. Its skin is grayish-green with dark green swirls and stripes.

Name: Grippli
Description: This creature looks like a bipedal tree frog, smaller than a halfling, and with humanoid arms and hands in place of its forelimbs. Its skin is grayish-green with dark green swirls and stripes.

Name: Grodair
Description: Several water-dripping tentacles sprout from this four-eyed fish’s belly, while long fins protrude from its back.

Name: Gronk
Description: The most notable feature of the hairy humanoid is large curved horn projecting from the forehead. The creature’s thick limbs and torso betray its muscular power.

Name: Grootslang
Description: This enormous beast has the combined features of an elephant and a serpent. Its tremendous maw sports six frightening tusks.

Name: Grothlut
Description: Pale and glistening with moisture, this sluglike creature stares vacantly as a droning moan escapes its slobbering lips.

Name: Gryph
Description: This small jet-black avian is about the size of an eagle. It has multiple legs and a needle-like beak.

Name: Gryph
Description: This small jet-black avian is about the size of an eagle. It has multiple legs and a needle-like beak.

Name: Guardian Daemon
Description: This entity resembles a large bipedal bear-like creature with upward curving horns, elongated fangs, and blackish-gray fur. Its hands end in eagle-like talons.

Name: Guardian Dragon
Description: This immense dragon coils its long, serpentine body beneath spreading wings, its eyes glittering like burnished gold.

Name: Guardian Naga
Description: A contemplative humanoid face framed by a cobra-like hood adorns the body of this long, brightly colored serpent.

Name: Gug
Description: This towering menace has a horrible, vertically aligned mouth and arms that split at the elbows into twin clawed hands.

Name: Gug Savant
Description: This towering menace has a horrible, vertically aligned mouth and arms that split at the elbows into twin clawed hands. The blessings of its evil god have made this specimen more twisted than its lesser bretheren.

Name: Gulper Eel
Description: This strange being of the depths appears to be little more than a large mouth, flaccid body and dangling tail which glows with an unnatural red light.

Name: Gylptodon
Description: This armored creature has a bony, turtle-like shell from which protrude short limbs, a blunt head, and a short spiky tail.

Name: Gynosphinx
Description: This creature has the body of a lion, the wings of a falcon, and the head and torso of a beautiful human woman.

Name: Halsora
Description: This small, plantlike creature is a bulging mass of viselike muscle with sunken eyes that constantly drip viscous, black tears.

Name: Hamadryad

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This regal woman exhibits the grace and pride of the forest’s most ancient trees.

Name: Hammerhead Shark
Description: Beneath this sleek gray shark’s unusually shaped head, a disproportionately small mouth flashes with razor-sharp teeth.

Name: Hangman Tree
Description: This sinister tree looms above a field strewn with bones. numerous leafy vines, their tips looped into nooses, hang from its branches.

Name: Hangman Tree
Description: This sinister tree looms above a field strewn with bones. numerous leafy vines, their tips looped into nooses, hang from its branches.

Name: Haniver
Description: This small, bizarre humanoid creature has fin-like wings, strange yellow skin, and tiny black eyes burning with malevolence.

Name: Harbinger Archon
Description: What appears to be a miniaturized orrery zips through the air, with thin, sharp blades flashing periodically from within.

Name: Harpy

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: Save for the tattered wings and taloned feet, this creature resembles a feral woman with a wild look about her.

Name: Hastur
Description: This entity appears to be a skeletal human form hidden under tattered yellow robes, but it moves with unsettling, inhuman grace.

Name: Hawanar Genie
Description: This being is twice as tall as a normal human and has reddish skin, no hair, and small fangs. Its lower torso is shrouded in a cyclone of burning embers and flame.

Name: Hell Hound
Description: This creature resembles a thin, lanky wolf with reddish-brown fur, white claws, and burning, fiery red eyes.

Name: Hellwasp Swarm
Description: This hideous, buzzing cloud of insects is comprised of black and yellow wasps with hungry red eyes.

Name: Hieracosphinx
Description: A cold-eyed falcon’s head and great wings adorn the body of this otherwise leonine creature.

Name: Hippocampus
Description: This strange creature appears to be half-horse and half-fish. The front half resembles a sleek stallion with a flowing mane and long, sleek legs ending in wide fins rather than hooves. The hindquarters are that of a great fish.

Name: Hippocampus
Description: This strange creature appears to be half-horse and half-fish. The front half resembles a sleek stallion with a flowing mane and long, sleek legs ending in wide fins rather than hooves. The hindquarters are that of a great fish.

Name: Hippogriff
Description: This large, brown, horse-like creature has a hawk’s wings, talons, and hooked beak.

Name: Hippopotamus
Description: This massive creature has gray hide and an overlarge mouth with teeth large enough to tear through the hull of a small boat.

Name: Hodag
Description: Spikes cover the body of this vaguely reptilian creature. Its fearsome face features dagger-sharp teeth and glowing red eyes.

Name: Hound Archon
Description: This canine-headed humanoid’s well-groomed appearance and polished greatsword show it to be more than a common beast.

Name: Hound of Tindalos
Description: This gaunt, long-limbed quadruped has huge, soulless eyes and a toothy maw. The lean creature moves with a predatory grace.

Name: Howler
Description: This vile predator has a hide as thick and tough as leather. Wicked ebony quills run from its head, tail, and back.

Name: Huge Fire Elemental
Description: This creature looks like a living, mobile bonfire, tongues of flame reaching out in search of things to burn.

Name: Huge Gravity Elemental
Description: This creature resembles a miniature black hole hovering several feet off the ground. It is a circular region of absolute blackness, with a bizarre distortion around its edges as it warps light waves. Four spiraling, rotating arms of debris and light surround the circular region of darkness. Its facial features are small points of light, almost like stars.

Name: Huge Negative Energy Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a shimmering and wavering sphere of translucent gray energy with small motes of light winking in and out of existence along its spherical form.

Name: Huge Positive Energy Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a shimmering and wavering sphere of brilliant white energy with small motes of light winking in and out of existence along its spherical form.

Name: Huge Water Elemental
Description: This translucent creature’s shape shifts between a spinning column of water and a crashing wave.

Name: Huggermugger
Description: This small humanoid stands no more than 3 to 4-feet tall, with cropped, black hair, hidden beneath a black hat, pulled low so as to hide its facial features. It conceals the rest of its body beneath a long dark robe.

Name: Huldra
Description: This beautiful woman smiles coyly, but as she turns, her foxlike tail and the wood-lined hollow inside her back reveal her true fey nature.

Name: Hutijin
Description: This creature is at least twice as tall as a human and large bat-like wings protruding from its massive shoulders. A whip-like tail trails behind its scaled form. Its hands and feet end in wicked-looking claws and its mouth is filled with sharpened teeth and two oversized fangs. Upward-curving horns project from its head. Its flesh is dark red.

Name: Hyaenodon
Description: Slightly larger than a normal hyena, this spotted canine has the same shorter forelimbs of that breed but with a blunt face and larger teeth.

Name: Hyakume
Description: This bloated creature’s eyes protrude from between the fleshy fat rolls of its neckless, hulking form.

Name: Hydra
Description: Multiple angry snake-like heads rise from the sleek, serpentine body of this terrifying monster.

Name: Hydrodaemon
Description: The skin on this frog-like fiend is clammy and its eyes look dead and milky; its wide face is split by a fanged maw.

Name: Hydrodaemon
Description: The skin on this frog-like fiend is clammy and its eyes look dead and milky; its wide face is split by a fanged maw.

Name: Hypnalis
Description: Seeming to phase in and out of existence, this ophidian creature has a great striped hood like a cobra.

Name: Iathavos
Description: This immense creature has four bat-like wings and a spherical body. Red eyes peer from all sides, and two huge claws dangle below.

Name: Ice Drake
Description: This slender creature looks like a small immature white dragon with icy white scales and sapphire eyes. A chill hangs in the air around the creature. Its claws are sharpened and have icy blue nails

Name: Ice Linnorm
Description: A snake-like, dragon-headed monster of tremendous size rises up, drifts of snow and ice tumbling from its coiling flanks.

Name: Ice Troll
Description: This large, powerful creature has semitransparent flesh of light blue. Its body is completely hairless and its cold, piercing eyes are stark white.

Name: Ice Troll
Description: This large, powerful creature has semitransparent flesh of light blue. Its body is completely hairless and its cold, piercing eyes are stark white.

Name: Ice Yai
Description: This blue-skinned giant has three eyes, fangs, and claws. Its hair seems to be formed of delicate strands of ice.

Name: Ifrit
Description: This muscular, fiery-skinned man has flaming hair and spotted horns upon his brow.

Name: Iguanodon
Description: This dinosaur seems comfortable on two legs or four. Its front limbs are each adorned with a cruel-looking, thumb-like spike.

Name: Ijiraq
Description: Its head the skull of a caribou, this humanoid has wicked claws, and wears wrappings of ragged fur adorned with scrimshaw talismans.

Name: Immense Tortoise
Description: Plants and even trees grow atop the shell of this massive tortoise, which gazes about with dull, placid eyes.

Name: Immortal Ichor
Description: This strange—almost beautiful —purple ooze thrums with powerful energy and glows with an eerie light.

Name: Imp
Description: Fiendish wings and a whipping scorpion-like tail lash behind this diminutive, red-skinned nuisance.

Name: Incubus
Description: This darkly handsome humanoid’s batlike wings, curving horns, and bestial legs betray his demonic origin.

Name: Inverted Giant
Description: Instead of a head, most possess little more than a gaping maw the size of their neck, jagged bones and bits of skull serving as teeth for a monstrous mouth. They have no true eyes—what oracular systems they once had are now embedded somewhere near their sternums—but instead possess an innate sense of direction, and through the dark arcana that surges through their beings they can sense the location of their prey perfectly. Their moist, splotched bodies are marked with runes, and their muscles and bones are often visible through their translucent flesh.

Name: Irlgaunt
Description: An unwholesome abomination scuttles fluidly forth, its shape combining features of both spider and squid under an armor of rugged rock. While stone protuberances gird its upper portions, below it is a thing of angry red flesh and soft pink tendrils. Two gaping orifices full of tiny barbs split its lower body—a mouthlike slit surrounded by numerous narrow red eyes and, above that, an oozing alien aperture.

Name: Irminsul
Description: A split in the trunk of this strange tree reveals a swirling magical portal to an unknown destination.

Name: Irnakurse
Description: A mad-eyed mess of deformed limbs, misplaced features, and bone shards pulls itself along amid a cacophony of slapping flesh.

Name: Jabberwock
Description: This dragon has a long neck and terrible claws. The beast shrieks and babbles, thrashing its tail and wings in a violent manner.

Name: Jackal
Description: This sandy-colored canine resembles a slender-bodied wolf with short, graceful legs. It watches with dark brown eyes.

Name: Jackalwere
Description: This armored humanoid has a jackal’s head, bulging muscles, and a gaze that makes the world drift away.

Name: Jaculi
Description: This creature appears as serpent with a long muscular body and a squat, flat head. A mane-like ridge of sharpened bones surrounds its head.

Name: Jaguar
Description: The powerful feline’s muscles ripple beneath a golden coat covered in dark spots with a smaller markings within those spots.

Name: Janni
Description: This regal figure looks like a tall, well-proportioned human, save that its eyes sparkle with strange light.

Name: Jigsaw Shark
Description: Jagged markings decorate the body of this human-sized shark. A multitude of stains on its large teeth tell of the frequency and ferocity with which it uses its bite.

Name: Jinmenju
Description: A low hum surrounds this huge, gnarled tree. The rotten fruits that hang from its sickly branches look vaguely like human heads, and each fleshy melon drips with a thick rope of ooze.

Name: Jorogumo
Description: Eight spindly spider legs, flocked with coarse black hairs, stretch from the back of this otherwise beautiful black-haired woman.

Name: Jubjub Bird
Description: This enormous bird has a lizardlike tail and bright purple feathers on its back and wings; the rest of its body is bare and scaly.

Name: Julunggali
Description: Resplendent lilac and white scales adorn this gigantic serpent. A number of sharp, short horns crown its head.

Name: Jungle Giant
Description: This towering, plant-encrusted woman wields a massive bow, and her dark skin is decorated with numerous intricate tattoos.

Name: Juvenile Black Dragon
Description: Hissing green acid drips from the fanged maw of this black-scaled, horned dragon.

Name: Juvenile Blue Dragon
Description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

Name: Juvenile Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Juvenile Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Juvenile Seps
Description: This venomous snake is heavily armored and has unusually large fangs.

Name: Juvenile Sovereign Dragon
Description: This magnificent dragon is covered in splendid gold scales, and horns jut from its head like a crown.

Name: Juvenile White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Kampfult
Description: This creature is a man-sized monster resembling a tree trunk with six long sinewy tendrils spaced evenly around the upper portion of its body. Six smaller tendrils located at the base of its trunk seem to aid it in locomotion. Its body is dark grayish-green and its tendrils are dark gray changing to dark green at the tips.

Name: Kangaroo
Description: As tall as a grown human, this mouse-faced creature stands on powerful hind legs and has a stout tail trailing behind.

Name: Kappa
Description: This humanoid turtle crouches near the water, a suspicious look in its eyes. The top of its bowl-shaped head is filled with water.

Name: Kapre
Description: Roots and branches twist across the body of this huge, oddly proportioned humanoid to form impressive knots of muscle. Its many eyes shine with a warm glow like burning embers.

Name: Kapre
Description: Roots and branches twist across the body of this huge, oddly proportioned humanoid to form impressive knots of muscle. Its many eyes shine with a warm glow like burning embers.

Name: Karkinoi
Description: This hulking mix of ogre and crab has one huge pincer that snaps menacingly, while its other arm is a twisted, humanlike hand.

Name: Kasatha
Description: This strange, four-armed humanoid is sleek and muscled, with two spiked blades raised to strike.

Name: Kathlin
Description: This creature resembles a blackish-brown warhorse that rears, exposing six muscular legs and terrible hooves.

Name: Kech
Description: This creature is a monkey-like man-sized humanoid with sapphire blue eyes and greenish-brown leaves covering its body.

Name: Kech
Description: This creature is a monkey-like man-sized humanoid with sapphire blue eyes and greenish-brown leaves covering its body.

Name: Kelp Devil
Description: A large colony of seaweed about 20 feet or more in diameter covers the nearby area.

Name: Kelpie
Description: This hideous humanoid creature has slimy, transparent skin; webbed, humanoid hands; and a snaggle-toothed, horse-like face.

Name: Kelpie
Description: This hideous humanoid creature has slimy, transparent skin; webbed, humanoid hands; and a snaggle-toothed, horse-like face.

Name: Khala
Description: This dragon has broad, ragged wings. Its serpentine body ends in three long, flailing necks with hissing, triangular heads.

Name: Khargra
Description: This creature resembles a man-sized cylinder covered in metallic scales. It sports three large “fins” spaced even around its circumference. Between each fin is a metal sheath from which slide long claw-like arms. A large hole in the front of its cylindrical body is lined with many small curved metallic teeth and seems to function as its mouth.

Name: Kijimuna
Description: At first glance, this creature appears to be a mischievously smiling young child with bright red hair clad only in a grass skirt. A closer look reveals goblinoid ears and a mouth full of pointed teeth.

Name: Killer Frog
Description: This frog stands partially erect and has dark green skin fading to light on its underbelly.

Name: Killer Seahorse
Description: This elephant-sized sea creature resembles a horse crossed with a fish, with crazed whirling eyes.

Name: Killmoulis
Description: A tiny, unnaturally thin humanoid frolics nearby. It has a huge bulbous head with no chin and seemingly no mouth. It has an immense trunk-like nose. Its skin is pale white and its eyes are deep blue.

Name: Kodama
Description: This little green humanoid figure stands only three feet tall. Its head is faceless save for two hollow pits for eyes.

Name: Kolyarut

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Club
PrimaryWeapon.Description: This weapon is usually just a shaped piece of wood, sometimes with a few nails or studs embedded in it.

Description: Beneath its cloak, this man-shaped creature appears to be part statue and part metallic machine.

Name: Kongamato
Description: A massive draconic creature with a birdlike head dives from the sky, letting loose a piercing scream as it descends.

Name: Korred
Description: This creature has the upper torso of a small humanoid and the lower torso of a goat, thus giving it a satyr-like appearance. It has a long, flowing beard, and like its hair, is tangled and matted into frightful knots. It wears a simple leather covering on which hangs a large leather pouch. Its hair is dark and its wild, brown eyes have an almost feral-like gleam in them.

Name: Korred
Description: This creature has the upper torso of a small humanoid and the lower torso of a goat, thus giving it a satyr-like appearance. It has a long, flowing beard, and like its hair, is tangled and matted into frightful knots. It wears a simple leather covering on which hangs a large leather pouch. Its hair is dark and its wild, brown eyes have an almost feral-like gleam in them.

Name: Kraken
Description: This tremendous leviathan resembles a vast squid, yet the markings on its body are strangely unsettling to look upon.

Name: Krenshar
Description: This earless, panther-like beast snarls as the skin of its face twitches, then peels back to reveal the bone and flesh beneath.

Name: Kronosaurus
Description: This enormous, finned reptile has a long mouth full of sharp teeth and moves through the water with incredible speed.

Name: Kuru
Description: Disturbing tribal tattoos cover this red-eyed humanoid’s face, and his jagged teeth appear to have been filed down to points.

Name: Kuwa
Description: This golden-skinned fiend has horns, fangs, and bulging eyes. It grips a spiked club in its four-fingered claws.

Name: Lacridaemon
Description: The face of this gray-skinned humanoid stretches in a manic grin, even though it weeps steaming tears. Frost crusts its flesh.

Name: Lamhigyn
Description: This small, three-eyed creature has ragged, red-streaked wings and a menacingly barbed tail.

Name: Lamia

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This creature’s upper torso is that of a comely woman with cat’s eyes and sharp fangs, while her lower body is that of a lion.

Name: Lammasu
Description: This majestic creature has the body of a lion, the wings of an eagle, and the face of a wise human man.

Name: Land Lamprey
Description: This creature is a 3-foot long blackish-green eel with a large downward facing mouth lined with sharpened teeth.

Name: Larabay
Description: This pale, blond-haired humanoid possesses bright blue eyes, needle-like teeth, and the large, multicolored wings of a parrot.

Name: Large Fire Elemental
Description: This creature looks like a living, mobile bonfire, tongues of flame reaching out in search of things to burn.

Name: Large Gravity Elemental
Description: This creature resembles a miniature black hole hovering several feet off the ground. It is a circular region of absolute blackness, with a bizarre distortion around its edges as it warps light waves. Four spiraling, rotating arms of debris and light surround the circular region of darkness. Its facial features are small points of light, almost like stars.

Name: Large Negative Energy Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a shimmering and wavering sphere of translucent gray energy with small motes of light winking in and out of existence along its spherical form.

Name: Large Positive Energy Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a shimmering and wavering sphere of brilliant white energy with small motes of light winking in and out of existence along its spherical form.

Name: Large Stingray
Description: A wide, sail-like creature glides through the water dragging a barbed, whip-like tail behind it.

Name: Large Water Elemental
Description: This translucent creature’s shape shifts between a spinning column of water and a crashing wave.

Name: Lava Child
Description: This creature is a stocky humanoid standing about 5 or 6 feet tall with sooty-black hair and green eyes. It wears crudely constructed hides of fur and leather. Its face has a curious, almost child-like appearance and seems to be imprinted with a permanent, non-changing smile. Its skin is pinkish-white.

Name: Lava Child
Description: This creature is a stocky humanoid standing about 5 or 6 feet tall with sooty-black hair and green eyes. It wears crudely constructed hides of fur and leather. Its face has a curious, almost child-like appearance and seems to be imprinted with a permanent, non-changing smile. Its skin is pinkish-white.

Name: Leaf Leshy
Description: This little plant person is clad in a winglike leaf cloak and pinecone armor, wielding a twig as a makeshift spear.

Name: Leaf Ray
Description: This creature looks like a broad leaf with whiskers like a catfish and a dangerous stinger trailing behind it.

Name: Leanan Sidhe

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This serene woman has pointed ears and flowing crimson hair, and wears an elegant dress and a crown of twigs.

Name: Legion Archon
Description: This celestial knight bears a flaming blade as it flies through the air on metallic wings that seem to grow from its armor.

Name: Lemming
Description: This small, plump rodent has a calico mix of color and a short tail.

Name: Leng Spider
Description: This bloated, mottled purple spider’s eyes shine eerily as if resenting the fact that you are still alive. Its head swivels to examine the area as a twinge of regret washes over you.

Name: Leonal
Description: This lion-headed humanoid has golden fur, sharp teeth, and long cat-like claws on its hands and feet.

Name: Leprechaun
Description: This creature resembles a tiny elf with long pointed ears and a pointed nose. It is dressed in brightly colored clothes of red and green and wears a wide-brimmed hat.

Name: Leprechaun

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This creature resembles a tiny elf with long pointed ears and a pointed nose. It is dressed in brightly colored clothes of red and green and wears a wide-brimmed hat.

Name: Lesser Gibbering Orb
Description: These hideous masses of floating flesh appear to be covered with staring eyes and hungry mouths. The lesser gibbering orb is a pulsing mass of sickly greyish-green flesh, roughly 8 ft. in diameter. The orb seems to fly in starts and fits, but this is a ruse, for the creature is nimble for its bulk. It may be a distant cousin to the eye of the deep or similarly-orbed entities.

Name: Lesser Ooze Demon
Description: This creature appears as a humanoid-shaped swirling form of blackish ooze. Its head is crocodilian and its mouth is lined with sharpened teeth.

Name: Leucrotta
Description: This freakish beast has the head of a badger, the hooves of a stag, and a wide mouth with sharp ridges of bone instead of teeth.

Name: Leukodaemon
Description: This human-shaped beast has a horse’s skull for a head. It walks on cracked hooves and bears the rotting wings of a carrion bird.

Name: Leviathan
Description: This impossibly enormous, whalelike monstrosity glares with a hundred red eyes, its cavernous maw lined with rows of sharp teeth.

Name: Lhaksharut
Description: This six-armed creature appears to be made of stone. Its lower torso is a collection of whirring rings of metal.

Name: Lightning Mephit
Description: This small creature appears to be a humanoid-shaped being composed of electricity. Bluish-white lighting arcs in small bursts from its body.

Name: Lilith
Description: A curvaceous and beautiful woman with cinnamon-brown skin, dark red hair, and shining emerald eyes stands before you. She is scantily clad in scarlet robes and carries a longsword at her side.

Name: Lilitu
Description: While this seductive woman has goat horns, goat hooves, and a serpentine tail, her eyeless face is her most disturbing feature.

Name: Living Lake
Description: The lake’s surface is calm and serene, and a cool morning mist rises from it. Suddenly, it is alive with activity as a massive pseudopod, towering dozens of feet into the air, erupts like a cyclone.

Name: Living Topiary
Description: Shuffling forward on brambly limbs, this walking green hedge has the rough shape of a griffin and appears to move on its own.

Name: Lizardfolk

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: This reptilian humanoid has green scales, a short and toothy snout, and a thick alligator-like tail.

Name: Llama
Description: This shaggy, hoofed quadruped sports an elongated neck and large, crooked teeth.

Name: Locathah
Description: This lean humanoid bears crested fins on its head and back, and has the wide-eyed and wide-lipped face of a fish.

Name: Lukwata
Description: A long, spiny fin runs down the length of the dolphinlike body of this eel-headed predator.

Name: Lunar Naga
Description: Stark white hair frames the fair face of this snake-bodied woman, and its black scales sparkle hypnotically.

Name: Lunarma
Description: This monstrous crablike creature hovers in midair, its three clawed tentacles snapping aggressively.

Name: Lurker Above
Description: A black manta ray-like creature three times the size of a normal human flies toward you. Its body is black changing to gray on its inside or underbelly.

Name: Lurker Above
Description: A black manta ray-like creature three times the size of a normal human flies toward you. Its body is black changing to gray on its inside or underbelly.

Name: Lynx
Description: This long-haired cat has tufts of black hair growing form the tips of its ears.

Name: Lyrakien
Description: This tiny woman has a lithe form with delicate butterfly wings. She is surrounded by sparkling lights and gentle rainbow arcs.

Name: Lythic
Description: This creature appears to be a man-sized humanoid composed of smoothly-formed rock. Its features are human-like though emotionless.

Name: Maenad
Description: This wild-looking woman is covered in spattered blood. Her wicked smile reveals sharp teeth and her eyes suggest insanity.

Name: Maftet
Description: Broad hawk wings support this creature with the torso of a bronze-skinned human and the lower body of a tawny, bipedal lion.

Name: Magmin
Description: Built of fire and magma, this short humanoid radiates intense heat that causes the air around it to shimmer.

Name: Magmoid
Description: This elemental appears to be a massive of spherical ball entirely comprised of swirling liquid fire and rock.

Name: Maharaja
Description: Impeccably dressed and bedecked in exotic jewelry, this fiend holds an ornate saber in its backward-facing hands.

Name: Malenti
Description: A predatory gleam glints in the eyes of this stern-looking aquatic elf.

Name: Mammoth
Description: This massive elephant-like creature is covered in long, coarse hair, and its tusks sweep upward in great curves of yellowed ivory.

Name: Mandragora
Description: This small vaguely humanoid-looking plant creature is mottled green and brown. Its lower roots are splayed and resemble legs and feet. Its upper roots are long and resemble humanoid arms. Its head, if it could be called that, is a mass of solid vegetable matter covered in lumps.

Name: Mandragora
Description: This small vaguely humanoid-looking plant creature is mottled green and brown. Its lower roots are splayed and resemble legs and feet. Its upper roots are long and resemble humanoid arms. Its head, if it could be called that, is a mass of solid vegetable matter covered in lumps.

Name: Mandrill
Description: This brightly-colored primate has a bushy mane, dense fur, and a long ridged snout.

Name: Manitou
Description: An invisible presence suggests the shape of a giant-sized person, surrounded by a rhythm of subtle noises from the natural world.

Name: Mantari
Description: This creature looks like a man-sized flying manta ray, dark gray in color.

Name: Manticore
Description: This creature has a vaguely humanoid head, the body of a lion, and the wings of a dragon. Its tail ends in long, sharp spikes.

Name: Mantidrake
Description: This creature resembles a large, powerfully-built lion with a dragon’s head where its head would normally be, a pair of large scaly draconic wings, and a long serpentine tail that ends in volley of sharpened spikes.

Name: Marai
Description: This finely robed and nimble fiend has six colorful vipers in place of arms, and a long, forked tongue in its fanged mouth.

Name: Marble Snake
Description: This snake has whitish-gray scales, translucent in places where its underlying veins can be seen. The snake’s head is long and has a large lion-like mane of golden fur. Two long sharp fangs protrude from its mouth. Its multi-faceted eyes are red.

Name: Margay
Description: Black rosettes and streaks mark the brown fur of this slender feline.

Name: Marid Genie
Description: This being appears as a powerful and muscled humanoid with bluish-green skin. It is hairless, save for its dark eyebrows. Its hands end in powerful hands complete with elongated nails, and a wicked smile curls from its lips. It stands nearly three times taller than a normal human.

Name: Marine Crocodile
Description: This fishlike reptile has a thin, streamlined snout filled with needle-like teeth and a long, flat tail that it uses to propel itself through the water.

Name: Marsh Giant
Description: Cold, black eyes stare out from the fish-like face of this hideous green-skinned, web-fingered, and obese giant.

Name: Marut
Description: This humanoid is mostly hidden behind plates of elaborate golden armor, the spaces in between revealing flesh of black stone.

Name: Mastodon
Description: This creature is larger than a normal elephant, with enormous sweeping tusks and shaggy brown fur on its body.

Name: Mature Adult Blue Dragon
Description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

Name: Mature Adult Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Mature Adult Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Mature Adult White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Mawler
Description: The collar of the fine new cloak suddenly reveals a set of jagged teeth as you realize that it is a carnivorous creature, and you are wearing it.

Name: Medium Barracuda
Description: This fish is long and bluish gray fading to mottled silver near it tail. It has an oversized jaw full of sharp teeth.

Name: Medium Earth Elemental
Description: This hulking, roughly humanoid creature of dirt and stone explodes up from the earth, faceless save for two glowing gemstone eyes.

Name: Medium Fire Elemental
Description: This creature looks like a living, mobile bonfire, tongues of flame reaching out in search of things to burn.

Name: Medium Gravity Elemental
Description: This creature resembles a miniature black hole hovering several feet off the ground. It is a circular region of absolute blackness, with a bizarre distortion around its edges as it warps light waves. Four spiraling, rotating arms of debris and light surround the circular region of darkness. Its facial features are small points of light, almost like stars.

Name: Medium Negative Energy Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a shimmering and wavering sphere of translucent gray energy with small motes of light winking in and out of existence along its spherical form.

Name: Medium Positive Energy Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a shimmering and wavering sphere of brilliant white energy with small motes of light winking in and out of existence along its spherical form.

Name: Medium Stingray
Description: A wide, sail-like creature glides through the water dragging a barbed, whip-like tail behind it.

Name: Medium Water Elemental
Description: This translucent creature’s shape shifts between a spinning column of water and a crashing wave.

Name: Medusa

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This slender, attractive woman has strangely glowing eyes and a full head of hissing snakes for hair.

Name: Megalania
Description: This gigantic lizard has short but powerful limbs, a muscular tail, and a spiny crest that runs the length of its body.

Name: Megaloceros
Description: The massive and majestic elk stands fully the height of a human at its shoulder, and its antlers stretch over ten feet across.

Name: Megatherium
Description: This great sloth, standing on its hind legs, can reach the treetops with its agile tongue to grab at foliage.

Name: Memitim
Description: Eyes with the dead cast of onyx glare from beneath the legionnaire’s helmet worn by this ominous, black-winged woman.

Name: Memory Child
Description: A small innocent child, seemingly confused or lost, stands in front of you.

Name: Mercane
Description: The tall, blue-skinned humanoid is clad in loose, flowing robes. Its alien face has too many eyes and its hands have too few fingers.

Name: Merfolk
Description: Slipping in and out of the crashing waves, this beautiful woman has the lower torso of a long, slender fish.

Name: Mezlan
Description: An amorphous blob coalesces, forming into a humanoid figure. As it stabilizes, intricate details emerge.

Name: Midnight Peddler
Description: This creature appears as a normal human, cloaked in a long gray hooded robe. A long protruding, sharp jaw can be seen under the hood. He moves with a shuffling gait, pushing a wooden cart that squeaks as it rolls along.

Name: Mi-Go
Description: This unnaturally graceful creature has a bulbous fungoid lump for a head, spiny insectoid wings, and a tangle of spiky, clawed legs.

Name: Mimi
Description: This tiny fey resembles a 1-foot tall elf with small bee-like wings, silver hair, milk white skin, and icy blue eyes. It is dressed in colorful garments of blue, silver, or green and carries a tiny short sword in a scabbard slung across its backs, resting between its wings.

Name: Mindslaver Mold
Description: A thick sheet of filthy green fungus grows in twisting patterns across the shoulders and back of this feral-looking man.

Name: Mire Brute
Description: This creature resembles a vaguely humanoid monster about 12 feet tall covered with slime. Sharpened wooden stakes seemingly jut from its body at various points and angles. No discernible facial features are present.

Name: Mist Drake
Description: This lanky dragon’s dappled grayish scales and sprawling wings shift and fade in color, blending in with the mist.

Name: Mite

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This squat humanoid seems to be nearly all head—an unfortunate circumstance, considering how ugly its puffy blue face is.

Name: Mite

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This squat humanoid seems to be nearly all head—an unfortunate circumstance, considering how ugly its puffy blue face is.

Name: Mobat
Description: This bat has a wingspan the length of two humans, over-sized ears, and a squat, upturned snout with rows of needle-like teeth.

Name: Mobogo
Description: Of bulbous body and bizarre shape, this gigantic, toad-like beast combines the most disgusting traits of dragon and amphibian. Reptilian wings unfurl from its leaking corpulence, its frame heaped with rolls of corded muscle and moist frog fat. Three buckler-sized yellow eyes protrude above a wide, drooling maw lined with teeth the size of daggers. From this cavernous hollow echoing with deep croaking belches darts a thick tongue the color of an angry bruise, darting forth to greedily snatch up flies, birds, and anything else that comes too near.

Name: Mockingfey
Description: This tiny avian has the head of a humanoid and the body of a brilliantly colored parrot.

Name: Moloch
Description: This immense figure appears to be a suit of blackened, diabolic armor filled with shrieking blasts of blistering fire.

Name: Monaciello
Description: Dressed in red robes like those of a monk, this little monster displays a sharp-toothed smile and flips a gold coin in its hand.

Name: Monadic Deva
Description: This angelic being has smooth skin, a muscular body, and large golden wings, and wields a large mace.

Name: Monadic Deva

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: This angelic being has smooth skin, a muscular body, and large golden wings, and wields a large mace.

Name: Mongrelman
Description: The hideous creature approaching from the shadows looks to be pieced together from parts of other monsters as some sort of vile joke or blight on Nature.

Name: Mongrelman
Description: The hideous creature approaching from the shadows looks to be pieced together from parts of other monsters as some sort of vile joke or blight on Nature.

Name: Monkey Goblin
Description: This creature has the wide head and toothy mouth of a goblin with dappled green skin, simian hands and feet, and a long, ratlike tail.

Name: Moon Dog
Description: This creature appears to be a large grayish-black sleek hound standing about 3 feet tall at the shoulder. Its triangular head has a somewhat human appearance. Its eyes are white with amber pupils.

Name: Moonflower
Description: A twisted trunk clustered with bulbous blossoms holds up a gaping mouth ready to swallow a victim whole.

Name: Moose
Description: This furred herd animal has a rack of wide antlers spreading out from its head in an impressive expanse.

Name: Moose
Description: This furred herd animal has a rack of wide antlers spreading out from its head in an impressive expanse.

Name: Morrigna
Description: A morbidly beautiful woman clad in a gown of spider silk leans upon a staff seemingly topped with a giant spider. The fetishes of savage magical traditions dangle from thick strands that wrap her form, even mummifying her angular face.

Name: Moss Troll
Description: This large and lanky moss-colored humanoid has an elongated, toothy snout and appears to be covered in bits of foliage.

Name: Mothman
Description: A shroud of dark wings cloaks this thin, humanoid shape. Two monstrous red eyes glare malevolently from its narrow face.

Name: Mountain Lion
Description: This large cat has a bushy tail with a black tip. Its fur is otherwise a rusty brown color with a light underbelly.

Name: Movanic Deva
Description: This creature resembles a broad-shouldered human with silver hair, white eyes, and large feathery silver wings.

Name: Movanic Deva
Description: This creature resembles a broad-shouldered human with silver hair, white eyes, and large feathery silver wings.

Name: Mu Spore
Description: Tentacles and eyes cover this floating, fungoid monster, and its vast mouth opens like a toothy cavern.

Name: Muckdweller
Description: This small dwarf-sized bipedal lizard has mottled gray and brown flesh with a short dorsal fin that runs the length of its body, tapering off as it meets the tail. Its underbelly is yellow and its eyes are white. Its feet are webbed as are its tiny “hands.”

Name: Mudlord
Description: This fluid creature’s roughly humanoid form is composed entirely of thick gobbets of soggy, brown mud.

Name: Mustard Jelly
Description: This creature appears to be a yellowish-brown amoeba.

Name: Myceloid
Description: This shambling fungus creature bears a strong resemblance to a rotund human, but with a mushroom cap for a head.

Name: Myrmecoleon
Description: This towering beetle-like horror has thick carapace segments and massive mandibles that leak sizzling acid.

Name: Nabasu
Description: This lanky fiend’s mouth is filled with sharp fangs, while great bat-like wings stretch from its scaly hide.

Name: Nabasu Demonling
Description: This creature is tall and thin with large, leathery, scaled, bat-like wings. Its skin is stretched tightly over its bones to the point that its underlying muscles can be seen clearly. Its skin is pale gray. Its hands end in long fingers tipped with razor-sharp talons. Its mouth is filled with tusk-like teeth, dominated by two overgrown tusks that jut upward from its bottom jaw. Its eyes glow with an eerie yellow light.

Name: Nagaji
Description: This dark-scaled reptilian humanoid has lidless eyes, and a serpentine tongue that flickers from a fanged, lipless mouth.

Name: Narwhal
Description: This small whale lacks a dorsal fin and has pale, mottled skin. Its most notable feature is the single tusk protruding from its face.

Name: Narwhal
Description: This small whale lacks a dorsal fin and has pale, mottled skin. Its most notable feature is the single tusk protruding from its face.

Name: Nazalor
Description: This creature resembles a bipedal, stocky, bronze furred hyena with slightly oversized claws and fangs.

Name: Neothelid
Description: Its slime-drenched length coiled upon itself in a shuddering mountain, this huge worm’s tentacled head rises like a snake’s.

Name: Nependis
Description: Resembling a bestial ogre with great tusks and thick, bristly hair, this brute seems quite nimble despite its cloven hooves.

Name: Nephilim
Description: The strength and stature of this giant-sized human is matched only by the nobility of its bearing.

Name: Nereid
Description: This beautiful woman has pearlescent skin and long, dark hair. Her nudity is barely hidden by a diaphanous, wet shawl.

Name: Nereid
Description: This beautiful woman has pearlescent skin and long, dark hair. Her nudity is barely hidden by a diaphanous, wet shawl.

Name: Nerizo Demon
Description: This man-sized feral-looking creature has dark bluish-black skin. Its arms end in sharpened claws and its feet are splayed hooves. A long, snake-like barbed tail trails behind it. Its hairless head is long and oval and its eyes are large and crimson.

Name: Netherspark
Description: This creature looks like a 6-foot tall humanoid whose form is composed of dark matter. Its head is featureless and sports no eyes, ears, nose, or mouth. It wears no clothes and bands of silver and white crackle and dance in its form.

Name: Ngoga
Description: These half-orangutan, half-cyclops hybrids are infamous for their unpredictability and unnatural agility.

Name: Night Hag
Description: Grisly fetishes and the rags of once fine clothes hang off the corpse-thin frame of this horrifying, sharp-fanged crone.

Name: Nightgaunt
Description: This humanoid has slick violet-black skin, horns, claws, bat wings, and a long barbed tail. Its head is utterly featureless.

Name: Nightmare
Description: This eerie horse-like creature’s skin is an inky blackness. Fire spurts from its hair and nostrils, and its hooves spray sparks.

Name: Nightmare Ettercap
Description: This strange humanoid looks like a gangly, distorted caricature of an ettercap, with spiderlike fingers and an enormous wicked grin.

Name: Nilbog

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: This creature resembles a small humanoid with a flat face, broad nose, pointed ears, wide mouth, and small, sharp fangs. It walks upright, but its arms hang down almost to its knees.

Name: Niln
Description: A large amorphous cloud of nearly transparent vapor hovers. Small water droplets dance and play around the form and occasionally drop to the ground. Three large sapphire droplets centered on their form function as eyes. When manipulating objects or attacking, nilns form wispy and vaporous tendrils.

Name: Ningyo
Description: This hideous sea monstrosity combines the most ferocious features of simian and carp, its fish-like tail sprouting a grotesquely primitive humanoid torso, head, and limbs. Although little more than 2 feet long, the nasty thing gibbers wildly as it gnashes its curling fangs and swipes at prey with webbed claws.

Name: Nirento
Description: Thorny vines encircle this tropical tree’s thick, spongy trunk, and jungle debris lies strewn about its base.

Name: Nixie
Description: This green-skinned fey has webbed hands and feet. Its hair is the color of seaweed, and is decorated with shells.

Name: Noble Time Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a formless cloud of yellowish-red vapor or dust about 5 feet in diameter.

Name: Nocticula
Description: This frighteningly majestic creature spreads wide her rune-adorned wings. Molten iron weeps from her hooves, and her three tails are studded with barbs.

Name: Nogitsune
Description: This fox-headed humanoid has a sleek, feminine form that moves with seductive grace. As she steps into a defensive posture, a mass of bushy tails flicks at the air above her back and she reveals teeth flecked with blood.

Name: Norn
Description: This towering, stern woman wears her long blonde hair in braids. She carries a reel of golden thread and a pair of shears.

Name: Nosoi
Description: Perched awkwardly, this strange songbird stares with a glint of intellect in its empty eyes. A stylish plaster mask conceals its face, while two pairs of wings ruffle over its body’s somber shades.

Name: Nothosaur
Description: This long-necked reptile swims through the water propelled by four paddle-like feet, whipping a long and slender tail behind it as it gnashes its sharp, needle-like teeth.

Name: Nuckalavee
Description: A large skinless warhorse ridden by a similarly skinless rider approaches. As it nears, one can clearly see the rider growing straight out of the creature’s back. The monster’s internal organs, veins that carry its blackened blood, and corded muscles are all easily seen by one viewing the creature. A thin layer of reddish mucus covering its body gives off a putrid odor. Its eyes are stark white, while those of the rider are a hellish red. Its body is hairless save for its bushy, matted, and bloodstained horse-like tail.

Name: Nuckelavee
Description: A mounted horseman gallops forth, soaked head to toe in gore and waving a blade with wild abandon. Yet as he moves, it becomes clear that horse and rider are joined as one—a humanoid torso sprouting from equine withers—and the gore is a grisly vision of naked muscle and leaking veins.

Name: Nue
Description: Materializing out of a noxious black cloud, this beast has the head of a fanged monkey and the body of a tiger with a viper as a tail.

Name: Nycar
Description: This cruel-looking serpent is about the size of a housecat, with two forearms and dangerous-looking fangs.

Name: Nymph

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: A delicate figure rises from the water, her long ears tapering to points above her head, her beauty painful in its perfection.

Name: Nyogoth
Description: This appears to be a mass of floating intestines tangled around a fanged mouth—the tips of its coils also end in toothy maws.

Name: Nysrock Demon
Description: This creature looks like a 14-foot long cobra with a demonic humanoid head and blackish-blue scales. Two downward-curving horns jut from the sides of its head. Its tail ends in a barbed stinger. A leathery hood flares from its neck.

Name: Oakman
Description: This squat fey creature’s brownish-green skin is as tough as tree bark. He has unkempt green hair, pale green eyes, and bulbous nose.

Name: Obcisidaemon
Description: This massive fiend has eagle wings, a tusked canine face, and a muscular frame. It wields an immense, cruel-looking halberd.

Name: Ocean Giant
Description: This blue-skinned giant’s clothing and beard whip about like sails caught in a storm.

Name: Oceanid
Description: This beautiful woman is clad only in sea foam and her long, white hair, which cascades over her body.

Name: Octopus
Description: Eight tentacles, each adorned with rows of countless suckers, unfurl from the barrel-shaped body of this large-eyed creature.

Name: Ogren
Description: This humanoid stands over seven feet tall, its features an amalgam of goblin and ogre. Coarse brown hair covers its sickly yellowish hide, though its hideous face remains entirely hairless, except for the long, knotted tangle of greasy hair spilling from its head. It stares coldly with deep-set eyes the color of pitch.

Name: Ogrillon

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Spear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A spear is 5 feet in length and can be thrown.

Description: This ugly brute appears to be a mix of ogre and perhaps orc. Its skin is covered in closely fitting bony plates and nodes akin to an alligator. Its hair is greasy, ragged, and generally unkempt. It exudes a strong sour odor from its body.

Name: Oil Shark
Description: An immense, eyeless shark over 20 feet long feet darts through the flames, its blackish-blue, metallic scales gleam with blackish oil.

Name: Old Blue Dragon
Description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

Name: Old Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Old Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Old White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Olethrodaemon
Description: Crowned with a wicked array of twisted horns, this wide-mouthed, spherical behemoth stands on four stout legs.

Name: Oma
Description: This amorphous, whale-like creature floats ponderously, arcs of brilliant energy filling its mouth and rolling down its body.

Name: Onyx Deer
Description: This creature looks like a deer about 5 feet tall at the shoulders with a dark brown head and chest changing to light brown on the rest of its body. A large white patch is prevalent across its back and rump. It has huge antlers at least as wide as a typical human is tall.

Name: Oolioddroo
Description: This skeletally thin woman has a mothlike face, flies upon dragonfly wings, and is wrapped in shadows.

Name: Orca
Description: This sleek black whale has a distinctive white patch near each eye and a mouth filled with sharp teeth.

Name: Oread
Description: This large warrior appears heavy and solid, with chiseled, angular features that make her look almost like a statue brought to life.

Name: Orog
Description: This creature looks like a gray-skinned stocky humanoid with coarse dark hair and dark eyes. Small upward curving tusks jut from its lower jaw.

Name: Oronci
Description: A cruel face and orc features dominate this creature’s upper half, while its lower quarters bear the sinewy shape of a centipede.

Name: Ostiarius
Description: Cloaked in shadows, every curve and sculpted muscle of this vision of physical perfection suggests some new gasping pleasure or titillating torture.

Name: Ostrich
Description: This human-sized bird has a long neck and legs sprouting from a round body covered in fluffy gray feathers.

Name: Otyugh
Description: This three-legged freak is mostly mouth. Three tentacles, two tipped with barbs and one with eyes, extend from its sides.

Name: Ovinnik
Description: Covered in sleek black fur, this vaguely feline humanoid holds flickering flames in its clawed hand.

Name: Owb
Description: This thing looks like a skeletal human torso coated in liquid shadow, obscuring its bones but clearly revealing its shape.

Name: Pachycephalosaurus
Description: This bipedal reptile has a rounded, dome-like head adorned with bony frills and ridges.

Name: Pairaka
Description: Blue-skinned and draped in revealing attire, this humanoid fiend has a sultry gaze suggesting all manner of debased pleasures.

Name: Pale Stranger
Description: This nearly skeletal figure wields a pistol in each hand. Its garb is dusty and weathered, and smells of old decay.

Name: Panda
Description: This black-and-white-furred bear is about as long in the body as an average human—but much rounder.

Name: Panotti
Description: This bald humanoid looks strikingly human except for the long folds of skin that droop from his head and neck to just above his ankles.

Name: Paracletus
Description: A small cluster of shimmering lights floats in the air, orbited by multiple vibrant crystals and gemstones.

Name: Pard
Description: This brightly-colored feline blur resembles a cheetah with longer fur and lynx-like ears, and seems to scorch the air as it moves.

Name: Pazuzu
Description: Held aloft by four great feathered wings, this hawk-faced fiend has a scorpion’s tail and carries a black metal scepter.

Name: Pazuzu
Description: Held aloft by four great feathered wings, this hawk-faced fiend has a scorpion’s tail and carries a black metal scepter.

Name: Pech
Description: This small humanoid stands about the height of a dwarf and has gangly arms and legs. Its hands are broad and its skin is ochre-colored with lighter shades on its palms and feet. Its hair is lightly colored, a mix of reds and browns. Its large bulbous eyes are stark white and lack any discernible pupils.

Name: Pech
Description: This small humanoid stands about the height of a dwarf and has gangly arms and legs. Its hands are broad and its skin is ochre-colored with lighter shades on its palms and feet. Its hair is lightly colored, a mix of reds and browns. Its large bulbous eyes are stark white and lack any discernible pupils.

Name: Peluda
Description: Shuffling forward on thunderous elephantine limbs comes an immense dragon-like beast. Its serpentine maw snaps angrily at the end of a long, sinuous neck, and steam issues forth from between its razor-sharp fangs. A powerful tail moves in rhythm with the bobbing head, displaying a wicked set of spikes. Scores of quills jut from the beast’s flanks, bristling outward with menacing intent.

Name: Peri
Description: This beautiful albino woman is wreathed in wings of brilliant flame.

Name: Peryton
Description: This creature has a stag’s body, a hawk’s wings and talons, and the head of a slavering wolf with a rack of sharp antlers on its brow.

Name: Pestie

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This creature is a rather ugly humanoid about 2 feet tall. It has long pointed ears and a large round nose. Its skin is grayish-brown.

Name: Phantom Fungus
Description: This creature’s round, plant-like body has four stubby legs akin to mushroom stems and a mass of tentacles spill from where there should be a head.

Name: Phantom Stalker
Description: This creature resembles a tall, powerfully muscled humanoid with fiery red flesh. Its face is flattish and oval with a large wide mouth and round, inset eyes of orange.

Name: Phase Spider
Description: This large spider-like monster has an eerie, humanoid face surrounded by a shaggy mane of fur.

Name: Phasmadaemon
Description: This serpentine monstrosity has the long snout of a crocodile, ram’s horns, and mantis claws projecting from its sinuous body.

Name: Phoenix
Description: This immense bird seems to be made of living flame. It spreads its wings and gives vent to a musical cry as it takes to the air.

Name: Phooka

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: These small hairy creatures resemble a cross between a goblin and a child’s fuzzy play bear. They have wide set glowing golden eyes and long pointed ears like those of a donkey. They have a mouth to match their ears, complete with buck teeth.

Name: Pipefox
Description: This furry, minute serpent has a foxlike head and tiny eyes that glitter with intelligence.

Name: Piranha Swarm
Description: This school of red-bellied fish swims swiftly, each tiny mouth filled with rows of razor-sharp teeth ready to feast on flesh.

Name: Piranha Swarm
Description: This school of red-bellied fish swims swiftly, each tiny mouth filled with rows of razor-sharp teeth ready to feast on flesh.

Name: Piranha Swarm
Description: This school of red-bellied fish swims swiftly, each tiny mouth filled with rows of razor-sharp teeth ready to feast on flesh.

Name: Piscodaemon
Description: This hideous cross between a lobster, an octopus, and a human threatens enemies with powerful claws and writhing tentacles.

Name: Piscodaemon
Description: This hideous cross between a lobster, an octopus, and a human threatens enemies with powerful claws and writhing tentacles.

Name: Pit Hag
Description: Wiry, wicked females look like little more than burned blistered skin pulled over bones. Tiny horns jut from their forehead and they have razor sharp talons springing from their long fingered hands.

Name: Pixie
Description: This tiny, whimsical-looking humanoid darts about swiftly on wildly colored gossamer wings.

Name: Planetar
Description: Muscular, bald, and tall, this humanoid creature has emerald skin and two pairs of shining, white-feathered wings.

Name: Plantoid
Description: This creature is a floating sphere of moss with several red eyes that are randomly spaced over the surface of the sphere, looking out through eyelid-like gaps.

Name: Plantoid Servitor
Description: These shambling humanoids resemble green-skinned zombies with glowing red eyes, their heads draped with moss.

Name: Platypus
Description: This creature is plump, brown, and covered in sleek fur, but it has a duck’s bill, a flat tail, and webbed feet.

Name: Pleroma
Description: Within the shadows of this vaguely humanoid figure stir swirling colors and spheres, as if it encompassed all the night sky.

Name: Poisonous Frog
Description: This small greenish-brown frog has black stripes on its hind legs.

Name: Polar Bear
Description: This large bear is completely white save for small black eyes and black lips hiding huge, glistening teeth.

Name: Polevik
Description: Toadstools, puffballs, and other bizarre fungal growths sprout from this small, hunchbacked man’s mold-streaked body. His beady eyes burn with paranoia and malice.

Name: Pooka

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This creature combines the features of a sprightly girl and a black rabbit. A wicked, whimsical grin gleams on her face.

Name: Popobala
Description: This brawny, sallow-skinned figure is muscular but lean, with batlike wings and a single hideous eye in its noseless face.

Name: Proscriber
Description: Standing proudly, an 8-foot tall warrior dressed in full plate armor, wields a weapon (usually a sword or mace), and carrying a shield, waits as if to be summoned forth. Heraldic symbols inscribed on its shield, armor, and weapons pronounce his faith to all.

Name: Protector
Description: This creature resembles a tall, powerful human with green eyes and a bald head. It is dressed in long, flowing green robes that seem to billow as though blown by an invisible and unfelt gentle breeze.

Name: Pseudodragon
Description: This housecat-sized miniature dragon has fine scales, sharp horns, wicked little teeth, and a tail tipped with a barbed stinger.

Name: Ptarmigan
Description: This small bird has a mix of brown and white feathers and makes a loud croaking sound.

Name: Puffin
Description: This squat, black-and-white bird has a bright red-and-black beak.

Name: Pukwudgie
Description: A merging of an emaciated man and a porcupine, this sinister creature smells of death and decay.

Name: Purple Worm
Description: This enormous worm is covered with dark purple plates of chitinous armor. Its giant, tooth-filled mouth is the size of an ox.

Name: Pyrolisk
Description: This creature resembles a rooster with thinning feathers and leathery bat-like wings lightly covered in reddish-tinged feathers. Its tail feathers are a yellowish-brown save for one bright red feather.

Name: Qallupilluk
Description: The lumpy, scaled hide of this monstrous humanoid woman drips with icy water, as do its lank, tangled black hair and ragged sealskin garments, both decorated with numerous shells and tiny living crustaceans. A curiously sweet smell wafts from her.

Name: Quasit
Description: Ram horns curl back from the twisted head of this tiny winged demon, and its body is thin and wiry.

Name: Quetzalcoatlus
