Description: This immense flying reptile has a staggering wingspan and a brightly colored head with a razor-sharp beak.

Name: Quickling
Description: This creature looks like a small elf with large, pointed ears rising to points above its head. Its skin has a bluish tint and its hair is light. It is dressed in brightly colored clothing and wields a small, wicked-looking dagger.

Name: Quickling

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This creature looks like a small elf with large, pointed ears rising to points above its head. Its skin has a bluish tint and its hair is light. It is dressed in brightly colored clothing and wields a small, wicked-looking dagger.

Name: Quickwood
Description: This creature resembles an oak tree with a human-like visage in its trunk. Its bark is darkened and withered with age. A great maw filled with jagged teeth opens in its trunk.

Name: Quickwood
Description: This creature resembles an oak tree with a human-like visage in its trunk. Its bark is darkened and withered with age. A great maw filled with jagged teeth opens in its trunk.

Name: Rabbit
Description: This small, furry creature has long ears and oversized feet.

Name: Raelis
Description: This bronze-skinned humanoid is muscular yet lithe, garbed in colorful clothing emblazoned with glowing runes.

Name: Raggoth
Description: A sleek black-furred creature leaps from the underbrush, its gaping mouth showing a full allotment of sharpened fangs. Its head is wolf-like and it has six muscular legs. Its body is long and ends in a thick furred tail.

Name: Raiju
Description: The air around this strange, pale animal sparks with erratic flashes of static electricity, its body constantly twitching as if filled to capacity with the energy. It suddenly perks up, alert and seemingly ready to bolt.

Name: Rakshasa
Description: This figure’s backward-bending fingers and its bestial, snarling visage leave little doubt as to its fiendish nature.

Name: Raktavarna
Description: What at first appears to be a bejeweled blade shimmers and writhes, transforming into a hideous, red-eyed serpent.

Name: Ram
Description: A formidable pair of heavy horns curls from the forehead of this sturdy, brown-and-white-furred ram.

Name: Ram
Description: A formidable pair of heavy horns curls from the forehead of this sturdy, brown-and-white-furred ram.

Name: Rast
Description: This bulbous creature consists of many tangled legs, a bulging body of puffed flesh, and a mouth filled with sharp fangs.

Name: Ratfolk

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This small, ratlike humanoid has a twitching, whiskered snout, pointed ears, and a long, leathery tail.

Name: Ratling
Description: This ratlike creature has tiny human hands in place of its front paws, and an unnerving human face with a toothy mouth.

Name: Raven Swarm
Description: The pitch-black birds that make up this torrent of claws and feathers glare ominously from hundreds of beady eyes.

Name: Redcap
Description: An angry looking fairy, just about 20 inches tall, shrieks and waves a long, wool hat soaked entirely in blood. His wrinkled gray skin, silvered hair, and gray blue eyes give him the appearance of a miniature old man. His snarling mouth reveals small upward curving fangs, while its hands end in eagle-like talons.

Name: Redcap
Description: An angry looking fairy, just about 20 inches tall, shrieks and waves a long, wool hat soaked entirely in blood. His wrinkled gray skin, silvered hair, and gray blue eyes give him the appearance of a miniature old man. His snarling mouth reveals small upward curving fangs, while its hands end in eagle-like talons.

Name: Reefclaw
Description: Blood-red spines run the length of this frightening creature, which resembles a lobster in the front and an eel in the back.

Name: Renzer
Description: A massive, grayish-white shark-like creature swims forth. Its head is horrifically human-like in appearance, but completely hairless, having neither hair, nor eyebrows, nor lashes. Its teeth are long and pointed and its tongue is forked and brown in color. Its shark-like pectoral fins end in three-fingered claws and it has two dorsal fins, side-by-side. Its tail fins curve sharply and are a bit lighter in color than the rest of its body.

Name: Retch Hound
Description: This large, muscular dog has sickly brownish-yellow fur, matted or torn in places. Small sores cover its body, each oozing a thick, yellowish-green liquid. Its mouth is filled with long pointed yellow teeth, some broken off on the ends. Most disturbingly, it has four large yellow eyes evenly aligned across its canine head.

Name: Rhamphorhynchus
Description: This creature looks like a cross between a bird and a reptile, sporting leathery wings, a beak filled with needlelike teeth, and a long tail ending in a diamond-shaped vane.

Name: Rhinoceros
Description: This rhinoceros has a low-slung head with twisted ears that lie back along its neck.

Name: Riding Dog
Description: This burly dog is fitted with a small saddle. A low, menacing growl rumbles up from its chest.

Name: Riftcreeper
Description: This slithering mass of bubbling red ooze extrudes a nest of long, thin tendrils, as if tasting the air in search of prey.

Name: River Elk
Description: This majestic and imposing beast stands taller than a man, a many-tipped rack of proud antlers crowning its head.

Name: River Giant
Description: This slender giant dresses in simple clothes and has swirling patterns on her green skin.

Name: River Troll
Description: Similar in many respects to their swamp-loving kin, river trolls prefer a less slimy existence, and prefer to live in forested regions near rivers and streams, or under bridges.

Name: Roc
Description: This immense raptor unleashes a shrill cry as it bares its talons, each large enough to carry off a horse.

Name: Rock Reptile
Description: A long, warty lizard about the size of a small horse shoots from the darkness, snapping with its powerful jaws.

Name: Rock Troll
Description: This giant creature stands nearly twice as tall as a normal man. Its hide is earth-colored and its hair is dark. Its eyes are deep brown. The creature’s arms and legs are long and thin and end in sharpened talons. Its feet end in three-toed feet.

Name: Rock Troll
Description: This giant creature stands nearly twice as tall as a normal man. Its hide is earth-colored and its hair is dark. Its eyes are deep brown. The creature’s arms and legs are long and thin and end in sharpened talons. Its feet end in three-toed feet.

Name: Rokurokubi
Description: This human-sized woman is dressed in simple peasant clothing. From her shoulders sprouts a grotesquely long neck that coils about like a snake, and razor-sharp teeth fill her gaping maw.

Name: Ronus
Description: A horrific creature steps forth, its body that of a great gray wolf and its head resembling a tremendous falcon covered with light brown feathers. It sits poised to pounce, gnashing its great black, razor-sharp beak.

Name: Roper
Description: A huge eye opens in this conical creature’s front, just above a toothy mouth. Long strands of fibrous material whip from its sides.

Name: Rorkoun
Description: A large amber eye tops a swollen head, surrounded evenly by four mouths loaded with needle-sharp teeth. This enormously long, yet slender creature stretches the length of five men and appears to be composed of twisted strands of pallid flesh and veiny musculature. The tentacle-like thing moves with the awkward, alien speed of a hunting insect, unnaturally still one moment and darting forth with incredible speed the next.

Name: Royal Naga
Description: This snake-bodied creature has five necks, each with a regal, humanoid face in a cobralike hood.

Name: Royal Time Elemental
Description: This creature appears as a formless cloud of yellowish-red vapor or dust about 5 feet in diameter.

Name: Rukh
Description: This gigantic two-headed vulture has greasy, night-black wings and sharp talons.

Name: Rune Giant
Description: This giant’s skin is black and pitted, like roughly cast iron, and etched with glowing red runes.

Name: Rusalka
Description: This beguiling female figure is partly obscured by long flowing hair that dances and flows around her as if she were underwater.

Name: Rust Monster
Description: This insectile monster has four legs, a strange propeller-shaped protrusion at the end of its tail, and two long, feathery antennae.

Name: Ryven
Description: This humanoid resembles an anthropomorphic badger. Standing the size of man, his body is much broader and covered with grayish fur, colored with a white stripe running from his face and down his back to his bushy tail. His hands and feet end in elongated, sharpened claws.

Name: Sabosan
Description: This batlike humanoid has a lean, muscular body covered with fur and two large, leathery wings.

Name: Sacristan
Description: Chains and piercings torture this being’s bloodless flesh. The greatest violations invade its face and mouth.

Name: Sagari
Description: This unsettling creature has the head of a fanged, green-eyed horse and a body that is little more than a writhing tentacle.

Name: Saguaroi
Description: This humanoid plant creature has the prickly hide of a cactus, and smaller cactuses seemingly sprout from its flesh.

Name: Sahuagin
Description: This scaly humanoid has a long, fish-like tail. Its arms and legs end in webbed claws, and its piscine head features a toothy maw.

Name: Salamander
Description: This snake-bodied humanoid hisses with anger. Spines of crackling flame dance along the creature’s blackened, fiery-red scales.

Name: Salikotal

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: On lean limbs the color of spilt blood creeps a being of sinister grace. Eyes like embers and a sneer full of needle-thin teeth gleam from an unmistakably fiendish visage. A pair of crimson wings sprout from the back of the hairless humanoid form, fluttering silently like an assassin’s cloak, while in one hand it clutches the twisted, dagger-like horn of some infernal terror.

Name: Salt Drake
Description: This powerful creature resembles a blue dragon with mottled black wings and crimson eyes. Its ears are frilled and swept back against its head.

Name: Saltwater Crocodile
Description: This crocodile is nearly half again as large as a normal crocodile, and seems to smile with its long, toothed mouth as it lunges forward.

Name: Sand Kraken
Description: A huge, bloated, eyeless, formless octopus rises from the sand. From its pale, yellow shapeless body sprouts ten long tentacles tipped with cruel barbed pads.

Name: Sand Stalker
Description: Scurrying from the sands rises a monstrously-sized spider. Standing taller than a horse, its lean frame rocks gently and its pale hair bristles in agitation.

Name: Sandling
Description: This creature appears to be a large snake formed of earth and sand. A slit seems to function as the creature’s mouth.

Name: Sandman
Description: This creature appears as a slender, lithe humanoid constructed of sand. Delicate features can be seen on its face, and its fingers are long and slender.

Name: Sandman
Description: This creature appears as a slender, lithe humanoid constructed of sand. Delicate features can be seen on its face, and its fingers are long and slender.

Name: Sangoi

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: Dressed in tattered finery and an animal for a cloak, this small, gaunt humanoid has unnaturally long fingers and nails.

Name: Sangudaemon
Description: This human-sized, serpent-headed spider seems to be made of clotted blood, its dragonfly-like wings dripping crimson streamers.

Name: Sard
Description: This wriggling and leafless tree moves on spidery legs. Flickering motes of blood-red lightning dance in the cracks of its bark.

Name: Sargassum Fiend
Description: This shifting mass of green seaweed transforms from the shape of a humanoid back to a patch of algae, continually changing.

Name: Sasquatch
Description: Tall, burly, and hairy, this humanoid creature wields a large tree branch for a club and has a swinging, apelike gait.

Name: Satyr

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This handsome, grinning man has the furry legs of a goat and a set of curling ram horns extending from his temples.

Name: Saumen Kar
Description: This hulking humanoid’s dense fur is scored with rune-shaped brands. Skin cracked and blackened by frostbite stretches taught over a misshapen skull crowned with a pair of ivory horns.

Name: Scarlet Walker
Description: This crimson horror walks upon six long, thin legs. Its face is neither that of a skull nor spider, but some horrid mix of the two.

Name: Sceaduinar
Description:
This gargoyle-like creature has long spiky legs and a bat-like head—its body seems to be made of living, dark purple crystal.
¦

Name: Schir
Description: This goat-headed humanoid is covered in a mangy gray hide that only partly covers its gaunt but muscled frame.

Name: Screaming Devilkin
Description: This winged creature is humanoid in appearance with frail and spindly arms and legs. It has a long, thick tail that ends in a wicked barb.

Name: Scylla
Description: This massive sea monster is about 20 feet long with a rounded lower body, four large fins, a short tail, and six heads, each perched on top of a long snake-like neck.

Name: Scylla
Description: This massive sea monster is about 20 feet long with a rounded lower body, four large fins, a short tail, and six heads, each perched on top of a long snake-like neck.

Name: Scythe Horn
Description: This large stag-like creature stands the size of a large warhorse. A pair of jagged and terrible-looking antlers crown its brow. They look like they could slice a man in half.

Name: Scythe Tree
Description: This many-branched and twisted tree has few leaves on it. In the center of its trunk is a long, deep scar. Its roots are twisted and dark, blackened as if by fire.

Name: Sea Cat
Description: This fierce creature has the forebody of a great cat, with two powerful, clawed legs under a threatening mouth of sharp claws. Colorful fins cover its back and torso, leading to a sleek tail, like that of a great fish.

Name: Sea Drake
Description: Not quite sea serpent or dragon, this vicious beast is covered with shiny blue-green scales. Its arms serve as both wings and flippers.

Name: Sea Hag
Description: Hair like rotting seaweed drapes this ancient witch. Loose, algae-colored skin sags off her starved frame.

Name: Sea Spider
Description: This creature resembles similar arachnids found on land. Its color ranges through various shades of blue and green with distinct black markings. Its legs and bodies are covered with thousands of fine, sticky hairs.

Name: Seal
Description: This sleek aquatic mammal has a pair of flippers, a powerful tail, and a muzzle full of small, sharp teeth.

Name: Seaweed Leshy
Description: This vaguely humanoid plant creature has a body formed of soggy green seaweed and wears crude armor made from seashells.

Name: Seaweed Siren
Description: This creature’s three singing heads sway atop serpentine necks that extend from a bulbous body split by a wide, toothy mouth. Pungent strands of seaweed cover the creature like slimy hair.

Name: Selkie
Description: This beautiful woman changes shape rapidly to become a sleek, aquatic creature with a gray hide of short fur. Her webbed hands end in sharp claws, and her jaws open unnaturally wide to reveal pointed teeth.

Name: Sepia Snake
Description: Winglessly flying forth, a monstrously sized anaconda-like serpent descends from the sky. Its 30-foot body is nearly two-feet thick and covered in muddy brown scales with strange patterns and symbols on its dorsal side. Large glowing yellow orbs set in its wide, triangular head emit a haunting glare and arching its tail aggressively, it exposes a vicious-looking barbed stinger.

Name: Sepid
Description: Twice the height of a human, this horned monstrous warrior wields a massive blade.

Name: Seps
Description: This giant armored snake has large fangs, dripping with venom that hisses when it spatters on the ground.

Name: Seraptis
Description: This woman’s flesh is pale and clammy, as if her body had been drained of blood from the fanged slashes on her four arms.

Name: Serpentfolk

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This serpent-headed humanoid wears elegant robes over its sinuous body. The cuffs of its sleeves reveal wicked claws, and a long tail emerges from beneath the hem of the robe.

Name: Seugathi
Description: This worm-like monster has a hideous face of eyes and hooked jaws. It wields a wand and a sword in its twin tentacle tails.

Name: Shadow Drake
Description: This tiny black dragonlike creature has charcoal-colored scales and shadowy wings.

Name: Shadow Giant

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Light Mace
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A light mace is made up of an ornate metal head attached to a simple wooden or metal shaft.

Description: This giant’s skin is a dusky gray, and her long hair matches the silvery hue of her armor.

Name: Shadow Hunter
Description: The shadow hunter is a great, dark serpent that dwells in deep caverns beneath the earth, where it hunts dark elves and other Medium to Large sized creatures. An adult specimen is over 40 ft. long and nearly 5 ft. thick in its midsection. In bright light it can be seen to be covered with non-reflective black scales, and its underbelly is the dark red of clotted blood.

Name: Shadow Mastiff
Description: Although shaped like a dog, this muscular creature has a coat that drinks up the light, drawing shadows in around it.Its maw is full of sharp teeth, and a wisp of shadow drips from its writhing tongue.

Name: Shadow Roper
Description: A tentacled horror that seems to shift in and out of the shadows, this bizarre beast is an amalgamation of darkness and menace.

Name: Shae
Description: A white porcelain mask and elegant white clothing provide form and contrast to this shadowy woman’s body.

Name: Shaggy Demodand
Description: This creature resembles a man-sized, bipedal, frog-like creature with crimson skin. It is bloated and its skin hangs in great folds about its body. Its eyes are slit-pupiled and black, and its head sports a large, wide, frog-like mouth. Large bat-like wings protrude from its shoulders.

Name: Shaggy Demodand

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: This creature resembles a man-sized, bipedal, frog-like creature with crimson skin. It is bloated and its skin hangs in great folds about its body. Its eyes are slit-pupiled and black, and its head sports a large, wide, frog-like mouth. Large bat-like wings protrude from its shoulders.

Name: Shambling Mound
Description: A mass of tangled vines and dripping slime rises on two trunk-like legs, reeking of rot and freshly turned earth.

Name: Shantak
Description: This scaled, elephantine creature has two legs and a pair of massive wings, giving it a roughly bird-like outline. Its head is elongated and horse-like.

Name: Shark
Description: From a distance this creature resembles a giant snapping turtle. It has a peaked and craggy shell from which protrude four long fins and a scowling head at the end of a long neck. Rather than a turtle’s head, however, this creature’s head has irrefutably shark-like features. It has round, black eyes and a gaping maw filled with rows of razor sharp teeth.

Name: Shedu
Description: This creature is a winged bull with the face of a bearded man. It looks on you with a calm and knowing gaze.

Name: Sheep
Description: Covered in a thick coat of wool, this placid animal has docile eyes as it forages contentedly.

Name: Sheet Fungus
Description: What at first appeared to be an intricately carved tapestry is apparently alive as it springs at you.

Name: Shikigami
Description: Three and a half feet tall, this creature possesses swarthy green skin, a leering face with oversized features, and small, ivory horns.

Name: Shinigami
Description: This emaciated, robed humanoid wields a scythe made of bone to match the skeletal wings that protrude from its shoulders.

Name: Shipbreaker Sea Serpent
Description: This devastating serpent is over 120 feet long and 15 feet thick. Its body scales are dark gray-brown, festooned with barnacles, seaweed, and other sea life. Its maw is the size of a large wagon, with teeth the size of greatswords.

Name: Shira
Description: Moving with deadly grace, this brutal, thickly furred humanoid figure’s head is that of a lioness with dead black eyes.

Name: Shobhad
Description: This gray-skinned giant is lean and muscled, with four powerful arms bearing weapons. She wears only a decorated leather harness and a loincloth.

Name: Shoggoth
Description: This massive clot of luminous black protoplasm surges forward, eyes and mouths and limbs forming and dissolving from its mass in a churning storm. The smell of rot and corruption assaults you, and equally disgusting is the squishy, unwholesome sound of fleshy pustules and tissue forming and breaking apart. It is the sickening sound of birth, growth, and decay all at once.

Name: Shoggti
Description: This pale creature has four suckered arms that end in pincers. A gnashing maw gapes in its head between two staring eyes.

Name: Shriezyx
Description: This oversized, eight-legged monstrosity stares ravenously from its three beady eyes, its gaping maw dripping with green venom.

Name: Shulsaga
Description: Jagged scales cover this lean humanoid’s sculpted skin, glinting as it soars upon a disk of radiant energy.

Name: Silid
Description: A small goblin-like humanoid emerges from the shadows. It is dressed in drab garments which match its pale gray, leathery skin. An unkempt shock of short black hair frames its bat-like face, slightly pointed ears and bulbous red pupils and its long and slender arms end in four-fingered hands.

Name: Silvanshee
Description: This black cat has gray stripes, violet eyes, and an unusual white blaze on its chest.

Name: Simurgh
Description: This massive creature has the body of a resplendent bird but the head of a regal canine.

Name: Sin Seeker
Description: This strange flying creature is the size of a house cat and has tender pink skin and the stubbed features of a pig. Its porcine face is eyeless and its nose never stops sniffing at the air.

Name: Siren
Description: This creature has the body of a hawk and the head of a beautiful woman with long, shining hair.

Name: Siyokoy
Description: This eel-like creature sports sharp frills that run along the back of humanoid torso and down its long, powerful tail.

Name: Skin Stealer
Description: Dark pink flesh drawn tightly across its emaciated body, this being resembles a gaunt human stripped of its skin, its pulsing muscles completely exposed.

Name: Skin Stitcher
Description: This gaunt skeletal humanoid has heavily scarred flesh randomly stitched together. Its eyes are sunken and burn with hatred.

Name: Skrik Nettle
Description: A delicate-looking creature floats silently in midair. Resembling a large jellyfish, it has a fringe of bird’s feathers around its quivering central mass and long tentacles trailing from its center, with each tentacle ending in a snapping beak. It sings to itself as it flies, each beak making a different note in an eerie harmony.

Name: Skulk
Description: This lithe, gray-skinned humanoid is completely hairless. It has soft, almost childlike facial features.

Name: Skulk
Description: This lithe, gray-skinned humanoid is completely hairless. It has soft, almost childlike facial features.

Name: Skunk
Description: This small, catlike creature has a coat of black fur punctuated by white stripes that travel the length of its body and bushy tail.

Name: Skunk
Description: This small, catlike creature has a coat of black fur punctuated by white stripes that travel the length of its body and bushy tail.

Name: Skvader
Description: This small creature has the forequarters and hind legs of a hare, and the wings and tail of a wood grouse.

Name: Slaad Lord Of Entropy
Description: This creature stands about twice the size of a human and appears as a skeletal humanoid cloaked in impenetrable darkness. Two huge, 15-foot long, bat-like wings protrude from its shoulders. His eyes are hollow sockets of white light.

Name: Slaad Lord Of The Insane
Description: This creature looks like a dark gold amoeba with an oversized humanoid brain floating in its center. Three long, black tentacles extend from its body, writhing constantly.

Name: Slag Giant

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Shortspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A shortspear is about 3 feet in length, making it a suitable thrown weapon.

Description: Soot, ash, and coal dust streak this giant’s rust-colored skin. Her eyes hold a look of both determination and detachment.

Name: Slag Worm
Description: This massive wormlike creature of burnt iron and glistening hematite grinds with the roar of the forge. Its fanged lamprey like mouth opens to reveal the molten fires burning in its gut.

Name: Slaughterford
Description: A wiry figure approaches, its hairless body inhumanly slender and frail looking. It has two sets of arms, a smaller pair of stunted normal looking arms and a longer primary set knotted with wiry muscle with malformed forearms ending in long cartilaginous blades.

Name: Sleeping Willow
Description: Before you stands a low willow tree with a wide trunk, its bent branches sway solemnly in the breeze.

Name: Sleipnir
Description: This mighty horse has eight powerful legs. Its hooves leave shimmering hoof prints that quickly fade to mist.

Name: Slime Demodand
Description: This creature looks to be about 6 or 7 feet tall. It appears as a bloated, slimy, black humanoid with large bat-like wings protruding from its shoulders. Its skin constantly drips and oozes a thick white-gray mucus. It has thick elephantine legs and long, powerful arms that end in razorsharp talons.

Name: Slinker
Description: This creature has the appearance of an emaciated cat with wiry gray fur. Its eyes are sapphire blue and its ribcage is slightly oversized.

Name: Slithering Tracker
Description: This creature looks like a long, thin transparent protoplasm, almost snake-like in form.

Name: Slithering Tracker
Description: This creature looks like a long, thin transparent protoplasm, almost snake-like in form.

Name: Slorath
Description: Slithering from the snow emerges a 40-foot long serpent with glossy-white scales and a bluish-white underbelly, its long, slender, icy-blue tongue flickering. Its vertical-slit pupils glow an otherworldly greenish-blue and rows of sharpened teeth line tremendous mouth.

Name: Sloth Viper
Description: This large emerald snake has bands of gold and black ringing its body and a black-tipped tail.

Name: Slurk
Description: This disgusting beast looks like a slime-covered toad, but with two walrus-like tusks jutting from its upper jaw.

Name: Small Barracuda
Description: This fish is long and bluish gray fading to mottled silver near it tail. It has an oversized jaw full of sharp teeth.

Name: Small Gravity Elemental
Description: This creature resembles a miniature black hole hovering several feet off the ground. It is a circular region of absolute blackness, with a bizarre distortion around its edges as it warps light waves. Four spiraling, rotating arms of debris and light surround the circular region of darkness. Its facial features are small points of light, almost like stars.

Name: Small Stingray
Description: A wide, sail-like creature glides through the water dragging a barbed, whip-like tail behind it.

Name: Small Water Elemental
Description: This translucent creature’s shape shifts between a spinning column of water and a crashing wave.

Name: Smoke Mephit
Description: This small winged humanoid has soot-colored skin, crimson eyes, and dark wings. Small trails of smoke stream from its body as it flies along.

Name: Snake Swarm
Description: Hissing menacingly, this mass of snakes resembles a pile of slithering tentacles.

Name: Snallygaster
Description: With a terrible screech, the lean, scaly beast swoops down from the sky on great dark wings. A single eye stares out from its cruel face, and tentacles writhe within its sharp, toothy beak.

Name: Snow Leopard
Description: Grayish fur covers this large cat that allows it to blend in with the shadow and light of snow drifts.

Name: Solar
Description: This towering humanoid creature has shining topaz eyes, metallic skin, and three pairs of white wings.

Name: Somalcygot
Description: Four long antennae stretch from the face of this giant, multi-eyed flatworm. From its spiny, chitinous body emerge four tentacles.

Name: Soucouyant
Description: This walking nightmare resembles a white-haired old woman who looks as though she has been skinned alive, her bloody muscles and sinews pulsing grotesquely.

Name: Soul Eater
Description: This creature resembles a billowing cloud of inky darkness. Two long, pale white arms protrude from the cloud, each ending in a clawed hand.

Name: Soul Eater
Description: This creature resembles a billowing cloud of inky darkness. Two long, pale white arms protrude from the cloud, each ending in a clawed hand.

Name: Soul Nibbler
Description: This creature appears to be a grayish-brown rat about a foot long.

Name: Soulsliver
Description: This smooth-featured, humanoid creature appears to have skin made entirely of mirrored glass.

Name: Spawning Canker
Description: Pale and bloodless, a brutally decapitated corpse lurches forth. Where a head should be instead lashes a forest of horrific, unnatural tentacles, whipping as though trying to simultaneously burrow deeper into and escape from its fleshy husk.

Name: Spider Eater
Description: This massive flying insect buzzes through the air on four bat-like wings. Its bloated abdomen brandishes a razor-sharp stinger dripping with venom.

Name: Spine Dragon
Description: This dragon bears a forest of razor-sharp crystalline spines. Its wings are transparent and seem almost to be made of glass.

Name: Spinosaurus
Description: This titanic saurian has a crocodilian snout, powerful front claws, and a colorful sail-like ridge that runs down its back.

Name: Spire Drake
Description: This reptilian creature’s gaunt body, legs, and batlike face are covered in long spines. Two wings stretch out from its torso.

Name: Spirit Naga
Description: Yellowed, venom-dripping fangs fill the human-like mouth of this sinister serpentine monstrosity.

Name: Spirit Oni
Description: This evil-looking animated mask shows the face of a horned fiend, its eyes popping and its leering smile full of fangs.

Name: Spitting Sea Serpent
Description: The body length of a these serpents is roughly 15 to 18 feet, with a girth of up to 3 feet. They are covered with rough-edged scales of brown, green, or blue coloration, giving their hides a mottled appearance. Their heads are short, with thick, muscular necks concealed beneath a webbed fringe.

Name: Splinter Drake
Description: This creature looks like a wingless dragon about 12 feet long whose flesh is actually dark brown bark with a greenish hue. A bushy mane of twigs, branches, leaves, and vines circles its dragon-like head and a series of thorny spines runs the length of its back. Two backward curved horns, apparently constructed of the same hardened bark as its body, jut from the creature’s head. A dark brown snake-like tongue flicks across its fangs as it advances.

Name: Spore Rat
Description: This creature resembles a dog-sized rat with matted brownish fur and ruby red eyes. Its mouth is lined with sharpened teeth and its claws appear to be razor-sharp.

Name: Spriggan

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: This creature resembles an ugly, stocky gnome with a bulbous nose and reddish eyes. It has a shaggy dark mustache and ratty beard, both unkempt and caked with dirt and filth.

Name: Sprite
Description: This tiny winged elf-like creature has delicate features, transparent wings, and fair skin. It wears brightly colored clothes and its eyes sparkle with light.

Name: Sprite
Description: This tiny winged elf-like creature has delicate features, transparent wings, and fair skin. It wears brightly colored clothes and its eyes sparkle with light.

Name: Sprite Swarm
Description: Thousands of tiny, colorful winged humanoids crawl from every corner of the forest to form this buzzing, writhing swarm.

Name: Spyglass Archon
Description: The movements of this black-skinned humanoid are unnaturally quiet, clearly belonging to one used to slinking unseen and unheard through dark places. Ebon wings and a matching mask complete this figure’s stealthy appearance.

Name: Squealer
Description: This creature is about the size of a large gorilla. Its fur is long and yellowish-green in alternating splotches. Its shoulders are hunched and it has a forward-thrusting, pig-like head. Razor-sharp teeth line its mouth. Its four forelimbs sprout from its body – two from the hunched back and the other two from high on the hindquarters. A fifth limb grows from the middle of its back.

Name: Squid
Description: This slender red squid darts through the water with alacrity. Two large eyes stare from above the creature’s tentacles.

Name: Squirrel
Description: A small, bright-eyed bundle of fur, this woodland creature has a bushy tail as big as the rest of its body.

Name: Stag
Description: Majestic and graceful, this powerful animal has branching antlers atop it head.

Name: Star Monarch
Description: This brilliantly colored moth rises taller than a house. A long tail resembling peacock feathers trails behind the creature.

Name: Stegosaurus
Description: This huge dinosaur has a small head, twin rows of sharp dorsal plates, and a muscular tail terminating in a set of bony spikes.

Name: Stench Kow
Description: This creature resembles a large bison with a hunched back, long downward-curving horns, and grotesque facial features.

Name: Sthenno
Description: This hideous creature appears to be almost twice as tall as a normal human. Its upper torso is that of a well proportioned human female with scaly flesh while its lower torso is that of a great black-scaled snake. Small black wings protrude from its back. Instead of hair, its head is covered with writhing, deadly asps. Its mouth is filled with razor-sharpened fangs.

Name: Stingray
Description: A long tail fitted with a barbed stinger trails from this flat, triangular fish’s body.

Name: Stirge
Description: This human-sized creature looks like a cross between a large bat and a giant mosquito. Its wings are leathery and gray and its skin is drawn tight across its bones. The creature has eight pincer-like legs and a long needle-like snout. Its eyes glow pale blue.

Name: Stirge Demon
Description: The creature is a loathsome cross between a human, a stirge, and an abyssal fly. It stands on four stirge-like hind legs and grasps with its humanlike forelimbs, which end in chitinous claw-like fingers. It has the wings of a stirge, though wrinkled and seemingly useless. Its stirge-like head has distinctly human features and is topped with a bristled, backswept mane. Its mouth is tiny and filled with fangs, though its nose is long and sharp and is used to pierce and draw blood.

Name: Stone Maiden
Description: This creature resembles an exquisitely carved statue, female and shapely in design. Loose-fitting robes clothe her form and a veil hangs across her shoulders and wraps around her head, though her face is not obscured. Her skin is the color of shale.

Name: Stone Roper
Description: This creature is a vaguely cone-shaped creature with six tentacles and a large, gaping mouth filled with serrated teeth.

Name: Stone Treant
Description: This creature looks much like an animated sculpture of a tree. It has a thick, corrugated hide of bark like stone, with many thick branches. It travels along on clusters of humping and twining stone roots. It possesses no discernible face.

Name: Storm Giant
Description: This giant is a towering, muscular human of heroic proportions, with bronze skin, dark hair, and sparkling green eyes.

Name: Storm Hag
Description: This hag’s hair, claws, and teeth crackle with sparks of electricity. Her windswept hair billows up from her brow like a thunderhead.

Name: Stormghost
Description: This menacing creature stands on four pointed legs like those of an insect. A conical head sits atop its humanoid torso.

Name: Stormwarden
Description: This humanoid has dark hair and eyes. Its skin is sapphire colored, and its hair is long. A long beard dominates its countenance. It is dressed in leather armor and furs.

Name: Strangle Weed
Description: This mass of writhing vines and leaves looks like a large patch of seaweed. Several long fronds protrude from the center of it.

Name: Stringy Demodand
Description: This lanky, winged humanoid is covered in layers of long, ropy skin growths.

Name: Strix
Description: Monstrous black-feathered wings cloak this leanly muscled, onyx-skinned humanoid.

Name: Stroke Lad
Description: A handsome and wicked looking young man of sleight build with sharply pointed ears, small goat like horns jutting from their broad temples. They dress in fine silk robes and ermine lined cloaks and often bear a scepter or some other symbol of nobility.

Name: Stygian Leviathan
Description: A gigantic whale, twice the size of ship surfaces. Its dark gray flesh contrasts hideously with the yellowish-white of its underbelly. It cuts through the water with a short, gray- mottled gray dorsal fin with a sharp curve. Its enormous mouth is lined with nearly 600 teeth of white or pale ivory color.

Name: Stygira
Description: Gaunt and parched, this crone-like figure moves with the predatory jerkiness of a hunting vulture. Unnaturally tall and lean, her form is all cracked flesh and stony crevices spanning a wasteland of withered gray flesh. Shattered black teeth jut from a chapped, lipless mouth that stretches beneath a high, scarred brow devoid of nose or eyes.

Name: Stymphalian Bird
Description: This creature looks like a large crane with an unusually long beak and long, swift legs that end in razor-sharp talons. Its beak and claws are bronze-colored and its feathers are dark, changing to bronze near the tips.

Name: Stymphalides Swarm
Description: This cloud of long-necked birds rises into the air, screeching in a cacophony reminiscent of klaxons and clanging tools. As these avians flit among one another, their feathers glint with a metallic gleam, reflecting even the dimmest light back a hundredfold through a dim haze of blood.

Name: Stymphalidies
Description: Every feather like a plate of shimmering armor and its beak the length and sharpness of a knight’s lance, this towering, ibis-like bird looks to be sculpted from silver and brass. Standing upon long legs ending in powerful metallic talons, its beady eyes dart about voraciously.

Name: Styracosaurus
Description: This bulky, four-legged dinosaur has a long nasal horn and a crest studded with additional horns sweeping back from its skull.

Name: Succubus
Description: Tiny horns, bat-like wings, and a sinuous tail betray the demonic nature of this alluring woman.

Name: Sudoth
Description: This vaguely humanoid creature has a head that resembles a large jelly fish. Extending down from its large head is a manlike torso and arms that again change into a long knot of feathery writhing tentacles which it uses as a means of propulsion beneath the waves. Its lower torso is a mass of writhing and twitching tentacles.

Name: Suli
Description: This fine-featured humanoid wears exotic clothing and has flashing eyes; his arms are sheathed in a blaze of crackling flames.

Name: Suspiridaemon
Description: This tall, three-legged, vulture-headed fiend has a grotesquely long, suckered tongue and gangly arms that end in claws.

Name: Svartalfar
Description: This hairless, black-skinned elflike creature has an expressionless face and wields an eerie ebon sword

Name: Svathurim
Description: This hulking creature has the lower half of an eight-legged stallion and the upper half of a horned frost giant.

Name: Swamp Barracuda
Description: This elongated, olive fish has a thick set of jaws with a prominent underbite, and its body is covered in a layer of thick algae.

Name: Swamp Troll
Description: This large hulking brute has long, thick arms and legs, both of which end in sharpened and filthy claws. Its body is covered with moss and fungus, and its hair is dark brownish-green. Large, upward-curving fangs jut from its lower jaw.

Name: Swan Maiden
Description: This tall, regal woman is clad in a long cloak of pristine white swan feathers and silvery armor with a winged helm.

Name: Swordfish
Description: A proud fin flares along the spine of this large, sleek fish, its head coming to a spear-like point.

Name: Sylph

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This pale, waifish woman, her hair waving in a nonexistent breeze, looks as if she might fade away into mist entirely at any minute.

Name: Tabaxi
Description: This creature appears as a tall, thin feline-like humanoid with cinnamon fur striped black like that of a tiger. It wears no clothing or armor. Its eyes are a piercing yellow, and it has pointed ears and a long tail.

Name: Taer
Description: This hulking shaggy brute has a large sloping head, icy blue eyes, and an ape-like appearance. Its body is covered in thick snow-white fur and its hands end in powerful fists.

Name: Taiga Giant
Description: This muscular giant has dark gray skin and fiery red hair. Its lower jaw bears sharp fangs, and it wields a huge, primitive spear.

Name: Taiga Linnorm
Description: With menacing black horns jutting from its head, this two-legged dragon is covered in dark green scales and vicious black barbs.

Name: Tangtal
Description: A large feline creature approaches, its short, brown fur standing stiff. Small white flecks cover its head, throat and neck, and shoulders, and its long, upward curving tail ends with a white tip. It stands on muscular legs with huge paws with sharpened claws.

Name: Taniniver
Description: This legless, winged, white-eyed dragon is covered in patches of diseased flesh, squirming with maggots and oozing pus.

Name: Tarn Linnorm
Description: This nightmarishly huge, snake-like dragon possesses two equally fearsome heads. Its twin jaws seethe with acid and poison.

Name: Tarry Demodand
Description: This creature appears as a tall, powerful gray-skinned humanoid with green eyes and a long, oval, amphibious head. Two large, dull gray batlike wings sprout from its shoulders. Its hands end in blackened claws.

Name: Tataka

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Spear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A spear is 5 feet in length and can be thrown.

Description: This towering, blue-skinned woman has backward-facing hands and a feral, animal-like visage with exaggerated features.

Name: Tatzlwyrm
Description: Yellow eyes briefly flicker from a hole in a nearby maple tree. Suddenly, a large reptile leaps out, as green as the surrounding foliage and at least six feet in length. It has a dragon’s head filled with sharp teeth, and two arms ending in grasping claws. A cloud of greenish vapor wafts from its gaping maw.

Name: Tazelwurm
Description: The emergent creature looks like a long serpent with grayish scales and a leonine head resembling female lion with grayish-tan fur. Two long, powerful humanoid arms protrude from its serpentine body, each ending in vicious-looking, slender talons.

Name: Temerdaemon
Description: This humanoid creature’s limbs—four arms and four legs—bend in awkward configurations. It wields a scythe in its largest arms.

Name: Tempest Behemoth
Description: Three pairs of wings beat rhythmically, churning up hurricane-force winds around this vast, birdlike monstrosity.

Name: Tendriculos
Description: This plant’s thick trunk is capped by a crown of wide leaves, whipping vines, mushrooms, and a ravenous purple maw.

Name: Tendrul
Description: The size of a small whale, this amphibious creature has a pair of powerful flippers with which it pulls itself from the waters to sun itself on the stones. It has a head reminiscent of a piranha, the body of a giant grayish-black seal, and a bony razor-sharp scythe-like tail.

Name: Tengu

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: Black feathers cover this crow-headed humanoid, and its hands and legs end in powerful talons.

Name: Tentacled Horror
Description: Four tentacles emerge from the torso of this massive misshapen creature. Above these are a tooth-encrusted maw and a glaring red eye. At the top of the creature is a glistening black horn.

Name: Tentamort
Description: This creature has a small spherical body of gray flesh. Two long tentacles protrude from the upper half of the sphere while eight smaller tentacles hang from the bottom of its spherical body. One tentacle ends in a squid-like appendage while the other ends in a needle-like barb.

Name: Tentamort
Description: This creature has a small spherical body of gray flesh. Two long tentacles protrude from the upper half of the sphere while eight smaller tentacles hang from the bottom of its spherical body. One tentacle ends in a squid-like appendage while the other ends in a needle-like barb.

Name: Tether
Description: This creature has the appearance of an emaciated cat with wiry gray fur. Its eyes are bright emerald green and its tail is unusually long.

Name: Tetrolimulus
Description: From a body like a strange crab sprouts the torso of a praying mantis, clad in coral-colored crustacean armor. Swaying hypnotically, it rattles razor-sharp claws and raises its long, rapier-like tail stinger.

Name: Thalassic Behemoth
Description: Two massive limbs drag the bulk of this whale-like beast’s body from the churning waters of the sea.

Name: Thanatotic Titan
Description: This titanic, armored figure wields an immense axe. Its hands end in claws, and its voice thunders with ruinous power.

Name: Thawn
Description: A hulking humanoid cloaked in ragged cloth limps forward, its malformed, tumorous arms ending in claws the length of scythe blades. From beneath its rags droop lengths of loose flesh and a strangled wheezing issues from its deformed lips.

Name: The Oinodaemon
Description: This creature stands nearly twice as tall as a normal human. Its head resembles that of a diseased and rotting ram with downward, forward-curving horns. The wool and flesh of its humanoid body seem to pull away or drop away in sickly clumps. Its body is covered in boils, blisters, sores, and scabs. Thick white foam oozes from its mouth and a thin yellow ichor squeezes from its bloodshot eyes.

Name: The Old Man

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Spear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A spear is 5 feet in length and can be thrown.

Description: This old human man is bald, with long white eyebrows and an even longer white beard. He is dressed in an embroidered robe, wears wooden sandals, and carries a staff adorned with metal rings.

Name: Theletos
Description: Four bandy limbs, each splitting at the elbow into two three-fingered forearms, emerge from this creature’s crystalline body.

Name: Thin Man
Description: A gray man, composed of what you believe to be paper, appears in front of you seemingly from nowhere. He turns to his left, vanishing again into thin air. The next time you see him, he’s right in front of you, bladed arms crossed, ready to slash you.

Name: Thoqqua
Description: This creature’s thick, serpentine body is protected by dense, horny plates. A visible haze of heat rises from its red-hot scales.

Name: Thorny
Description: This creature resembles a hunting dog constructed of tangled briars, vines, leaves, and sticks. Its entire body is covered with small, sharp thorns.

Name: Thought Eater
Description: A nimbus of glowing, intangible matter envelops this strange skeletal creature with a birdlike beak.

Name: Thrasfyr
Description: Neither quite bear nor bull nor serpent, this immense, six-legged creature is bound in chains and covered with scintillating red scales.

Name: Thriae Soldier
Description: This creature has the upper body of a woman and the lower body of a bee. She wields a longbow with uncanny skill.

Name: Thulgant
Description: This monster has ten spidery legs, a head writhing with dripping tentacles above a clutch of red eyes, and three whipping stingers.

Name: Thunder Beast
Description: This huge beast has a hippo-like head with pointed pig-like ears. It has a large, wide mouth with small upright tusks jutting from its lower jaw. Its long body is thick and hunched. Six powerful legs aid the creature in locomotion.

Name: Thunder Behemoth
Description: This enormous beast has rocky, armored plates on its body. Elaborate horns crown its horrific head.

Name: Thunderbird
Description: This enormous bird has feathers the color of a stormy sky, a resemblance enhanced by the lightning that dances over its body.

Name: Thundershrike
Description: A tremendous winged shadow falls from a huge raptor with a wingspan the length of four horses. Its ebon feathers gleam majestically, streaked with patterns of gray and brown. Its golden beak is tipped with white.

Name: Thylacine
Description: This catlike creature has a striped pelt and whiskers that jut from a long muzzle filled with sharp teeth.

Name: Tidepool Dragon
Description: This small draconic creature seems better suited for the waves than wind, its wings sweeping along its body like massive fins. Light from the water refracts off its resilient-looking cerulean hide as it snaps crustacean-like claws.

Name: Tiger Fish
Description: Deadly, wolf-like teeth fill the mouth of this brawny fish.

Name: Tikbalang
Description: Merging the features of a horse and human, this monstrosity has an equine snout, sharp fangs, and long forelimbs with clawed fingers.

Name: Titivilus
Description: This 6-foot tall creature resembles a satyr with a round hairless head, the lower torso of a goat, cloven feet, and clawed hands. Small black leathery wings sprout from his back. His eyes are the color of coal.

Name: Tojanida
Description: This man-size creature appears to be a turtle with spikes jutting from its shell. The head sports sharp teeth but its many eyes are instead dotted across the creature’s shell. Its front legs end in wicked claws and the rear legs end in black-tinted fins.

Name: Tombstone Fairy

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: This wicked little creature is dressed in the garb of an undertaker and resembles a tiny gargoyle. It has tiny black close set eyes, and its skin is slate gray.

Name: Tooth Fairy
Description: This gaunt fairy has tattered ears, black eyes, and a huge mouth filled with mismatched teeth. It carries an oversized pair of pliers.

Name: Tor Linnorm
Description: This gigantic, wingless, four-armed dragon has rivulets of bright red magma coursing through its serpentine body.

Name: Transposer
Description: This creature looks like a featureless humanoid whose arms end in large sucker-like membranes.

Name: Trapper
Description: The stone floor ripples and shakes as a toothy, gnashing maw opens in its center, and then the edges of the room curl up and inward to reveal an underside of wriggling tendrils and fetid digestive juices.

Name: Trapper
Description: The stone floor ripples and shakes as a toothy, gnashing maw opens in its center, and then the edges of the room curl up and inward to reveal an underside of wriggling tendrils and fetid digestive juices.

Name: Treant
Description: This animated tree’s bark is knotted into vaguely humanoid features, with branches for arms and roots for legs.

Name: Triaxian
Description: This warrior looks like an attractive humanoid with pointed, feather-like ears and eyes shaped into long, horizontal slits. Though he has no true hair, his entire body is covered in short, sleek white fur.

Name: Triceratops
Description: This beast’s armored head has three sharp horns decorating its face and a large round crest angling back over its neck from its skull.

Name: Tripurasura
Description: This tiny monstrosity has the body of a well-muscled man, a crown of frilled horns, and eyes that glow like rubies.

Name: Troglodyte
Description: This monstrous humanoid taps its staff on the ground, calling upon magic before unleashing a horrific stench to keep you back.

Name: Troll
Description: This tall creature has rough, green hide. Its hands end in claws, and its bestial face has a hideous, tusked underbite.

Name: Trollhound
Description: This bullish canine has a hard, pebbly skin that turns away weapons with ease. It tends to lurk near the caves that it calls home at all times.

Name: Trox

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Shortspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A shortspear is about 3 feet in length, making it a suitable thrown weapon.

Description: This hulking juggernaut has two massively muscled arms and a group of four smaller ones that jut from under its rib cage.

Name: Trumpeter Swan
Description: This large waterfowl has a wide wingspan, all-white feathers, a black bill, and a long, curving neck.

Name: Tsathar
Description: This vile creature resembles an upright, humanoid frog with gray flesh and reddish-gold eyes. Its humanoid arms end in wicked claws.

Name: Tunche
Description: Standing on three legs, this creature is a mix of dangerous jungle animals and plants fused into one deadly predator.

Name: Tunnel Worm
Description: This massive creature appears to be a 30-foot long sleek black centipede with a long segmented body and many slender legs. Its huge mandibles are serrated and razor-sharp, and its eyes are multi-faceted. A ring of chitinous bone protects its oversized head.

Name: Twigjack
Description: This tiny, vaguely humanoid creature seems to be made completely of bundles of sticks wound with thorny vines.

Name: Tylosaurus
Description: Surging out of the water, this massive lizard is shaped like a giant fish with a powerful, toothed maw.

Name: Tyrannosaurus
Description: This bipedal dinosaur’s front arms seem small compared to the rest of its bulk, but its enormous head is all teeth.

Name: Tyrant Jelly
Description: This amber-colored ooze contains the preserved larva of a giant insect, almost like a monstrous brain.

Name: Ubue
Description: The creature looks like an ashen-skinned homely giant dressed in ragged animal hides. It has three heads, three arms, and three legs. Its mouths are filled with broken and rotten teeth.

Name: Udaeus
Description: This armored humanoid has skin resembling white bone, carved with images of weapons and dragons.

Name: Unfettered Eidolon
Description: This bizarre amalgam of monstrous parts rampages forth, an eldritch rune seared upon its forehead.

Name: Unicorn
Description: This magnificent beast looks like a white horse, but with a goat’s beard and a single long ivory horn on its brow.

Name: Uniila

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: The curves of a shapely maiden define the outline of a mysterious figure wrapped in mist and strips of ancient robes. From beneath the rune-embroidered tatters stretch four, corpse-pale arms, each bearing either a blade or some mysterious arcane device. Hidden within the cowl of its hood shimmer the faintest outlines of a veiled face and a pair of eyes flickering with barely restrained energy.

Name: Upasunda
Description: This six-armed woman has three fanged faces on her head. She wears colorful robes, and her hands wield several exotic weapons.

Name: Uraeus
Description: This two-headed cobra flies with a large pair of sleek, blackfeathered wings that sprout from its serpentine body.

Name: Urdefhan
Description: This fanged humanoid has hideously transparent skin, revealing the vivid colors of internal organs and ivory bones inside its body.

Name: Ursikka
Description: This insectlike creature is covered in downy white fur. A pair of eyes gleams above a three-part mouth that drips viscous fluid.

Name: Valkyrie
Description: Surrounded by lightning, this impressive female warrior wears a gleaming golden breastplate and carries a shining spear.

Name: Vanth
Description: This looming black skeleton wraps itself in the wings of a giant black raven, and a vulture-like mask of polished ceramic gazes balefully from where its skull should be. Without a gesture, a wickedly curved scythe appears in its elongated fingers.

Name: Vapor Dire Rat
Description: This creature looks like a larger, more aggressive version of a normal rat. Its fur is coarse and brown, its eyes green, and its tail is hairless.

Name: Vapor Wasp
Description: This creature looks like a larger version of a normal wasp with a jet black body and reddish eyes.

Name: Vargouille
Description: This creature is a blackened, bat-winged fiend’s head. Tentacles dangle from chin and scalp, and its fanged mouth hangs agape.

Name: Vavakia

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Quarterstaff
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A quarterstaff is a simple piece of wood, about 5 feet in length.

Description: This reptilian demon has a quadrupedal dinosaur’s lower body, a vaguely humanoid upper torso, and a draconic saurian head.

Name: Ved
Description: This hairy humanoid giant’s misshapen head appears too large for its body. It wields a lumpy, primitive club.

Name: Veiled Master
Description: This monstrosity has six eyes and six long tentacles—four that end in glowing spheres, and two with what look like hands.

Name: Velociraptor
Description: This small, sleek dinosaur has vicious, snapping jaws and feet that end in large talons for gutting prey.

Name: Vemerak
Description: This huge monstrosity seems like some alien, clawed insect, with vaguely humanoid features and three tentacular tails.

Name: Venomous Snake Swarm
Description: Venomous snakes slither and crawl over each other in a furious mass, their poison-dripping fangs glinting in the light.

Name: Veranallia
Description: This beautiful, rosy-haired woman has a lower body composed of a column of autumnal leaves and gently swaying vines.

Name: Vermlek
Description: A hideous, pale, wormlike head pushes violently up and out of a corpulent man’s body.

Name: Very Old Black Dragon
Description: Hissing green acid drips from the fanged maw of this black-scaled, horned dragon.

Name: Very Old Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Very Old Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Very Old White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Very Young Black Dragon
Description: Hissing green acid drips from the fanged maw of this black-scaled, horned dragon.

Name: Very Young Blue Dragon
Description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

Name: Very Young Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Very Young Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Very Young White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Vescavor Queen
Description: This verminlike creature has iridescent, membranous wings and its many sharp teeth drip with noxious slime.

Name: Vespergaunt
Description: This amorphous mass of eyes, tentacles, and protoplasm exudes thick, roiling clouds of green vapor.

Name: Viduus
Description: This dour being has a mostly humanoid form with its lower body wrapped in a cocoon-like husk.

Name: Vilsteth
Description: This fiend seems carved from weathered ivory, and runes and symbols of power cover its pale flesh. Its eyes glow an eerie yellow, and horns curl from its eerie, mouthless head.

Name: Vilstrak
Description: This creature is a bipedal man-sized semi-humanoid seemingly carved of stone. It has an insect-like head, long, large arms, and thick, trunklike legs that end in hoof-like feet.

Name: Viper Vine
Description: Large tendrils ending in tiny claws unfurl from the central stalk of this plant, which rises like a serpent ready to strike.

Name: Vishkanya
Description: This lithe woman wears loose-fitting robes and wields a cruel-looking blade. Her eyes are pure white orbs.

Name: Vodyanoi
Description: This humanoid salamander carries a gnarled staff in one hand. Tendrils drape its chin, resembling the beard of an eccentric hermit.

Name: Void Yai
Description: This towering, three-eyed horned giant carries himself with the self-assurance of an undefeated champion of countless wars.

Name: Volt
Description: This abominable creature appears to be a small spherical beast with a long, sinewy tail trailing it. Its body is covered with thick gray bristles. Two large eyes resembling those of a fly dominate its head. Small horns protrude above these from its head.

Name: Voonith
Description: This brightly colored, long-necked amphibian has six legs, a fanged snout, and numerous finlets running down its spine.

Name: Vorin
Description: This creature is an immense greenish-black thing with intense yellow eyes. It is 30 feet long and a foot thick. The body of the thing is a wormlike mass of pulpy flesh with several gill-like apertures along its length with which it propels itself through the water. The front of the beast has a long trunk similar to that of an elephant. Its skin glistens as if coated with a sheen of oil.

Name: Vouivre
Description: One half of this creature is a nude woman, and the other is the front end of a slithering, winged dragon.

Name: Vrolikai
Description: This black-skinned, bat-winged demon has four arms; a long, thin tail; and a leering, fanged face with dead, white eyes.

Name: Vulchling
Description: This creature looks like a man-sized vulture with inky black feathers, a gray beak, and dark brownish-black talons.

Name: Vulnudaemon
Description: A bloody, tooth-filled mouth that looks almost like a horrific gash gasps in the neck of this pale, childlike horror.

Name: Vulpinal
Description: From the black “socks” on its cheerfully bouncing legs to its large, perked ears and the whiskers at the end of its muzzle, this creature looks like nothing so much as a small, humanoid fox. Bits of clover and dew cling to its loose traveling clothes in places, but dirt and dust are nowhere to be seen, even on its feet and hand-like forepaws. Its amber eyes radiate a sense of supernatural calm as it puts a golden flute to its lips and plays a hauntingly beautiful melody.

Name: Vulture
Description: This dark-feathered vulture has a bald neck and head, and its long, hooked beak is caked with carrion.

Name: Vydrarch
Description: Seeping spines cover the inky scales of this long, sinuous beast, its twin serpent heads writhing at the ends of its swaying necks.

Name: Walrus
Description: The walrus watches stoically as you pass, its whisker bristling, and tusks gleaming.

Name: Wang Liang
Description: This feral humanoid creature is completely hairless with gray skin. Its eyes are pools of midnight with glittering red ruby dots that serve as pupils and shine with a hellish glow. Its hands end in razor-sharpened talons that have the appearance and color of iron. Its mouth is lined with rows of shark-like teeth and its ears are pointed.

Name: Warped One
Description: This insane, twisted, humanoid-shaped tangle of limbs and gnashing teeth thrashes and howls, all too eager to wreak havoc.

Name: Water Leaper
Description: This vicious monster has webbed wings, a mouth full of sharp teeth, and a long tail ending a black stinger.

Name: Water Naga
Description: Slender spines and brightly colored frills stretch back from the human-like face of this massive water snake. Every motion of the serpent’s long form sets its brightly patterned scales and glistening fins to flashing like gems in the surf.

Name: Water Orm
Description: A reptilian head on a serpentine neck slowly surfaces. Shadows beneath the water hint at a body of considerable size.

Name: Water Wraith
Description: This eight-legged lizard has a round, lamprey-like mouth full of teeth, and its scales slowly change color to match its surroundings.

Name: Water Yai
Description: This towering woman has blue skin, small fangs, and a third eye glaring from her forehead. Her robes are soaking wet.

Name: Wayang

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Dagger
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length.

Description: Spiraling patterns cover this shadowy humanoid’s skin, and its black hair trails away in wisps.

Name: Well Lurker
Description: An open well-like hole surrounded by a crenellated edge hides the devouring mouth and lashing tentacles of this creature.

Name: Whale
Description: This immense whale moves slowly through the water with a grace that seems incongruous, given its immense size.

Name: Whirlmaw
Description: This creature glides on undulating folds of leathery skin. Its spinning, circular mouth is lined with rows of razor-sharp teeth.

Name: Wikkawak
Description: This thick-bodied, white-furred bugbear wears bearskins and carries an axe made of ice and bone.

Name: Willow Dusk
Description: You see a 20 foot tall willow tree with dark greenish-brown branches and blackish-brown bark.

Name: Wind Walker
Description: A roaring cyclone at least twice as tall as a human bears down on you, spinning dirt and earth into the air as it moves.

Name: Wind Yai

PrimaryWeapon.Name: Longspear
PrimaryWeapon.Description: A longspear is about 8 feet in length.

Description: A third eye rests on the forehead of this ornately robed giantess, her figure half-shrouded in the darkness of a starry night that swirls continuously about her.

Name: Witch Tree
Description: A witch tree combines the features of a tall, beautiful woman and a willow tree looking somewhat like a female willow treant. Her hair and fingers form the fronds of the willow, her arms and parts of her hair, the branches. From a distance, the witch tree is almost indistinguishable from a normal willow tree. Its skin is thick and dark, resembling the bark of a tree. Its legs join together to form the roots.

Name: Witchcrow
Description: Unnatural intelligence glows in the bright green eyes of this large, jet-black crow.

Name: Witherstench
Description: This creature resembles a putrid yellow skunk with very little fur and whose body is splotched with tiny purple spots. Patches of darker fur are sprinkled about its body.

Name: Wolf
Description: This powerful canine watches its prey with piercing yellow eyes, darting its tongue across sharp white teeth.

Name: Wolliped
Description: This shaggy, multi-legged creature has a flattened face with wide nostrils and four eyes. Ivory tusks jut downward, flanking its mouth.

Name: Wolliped
Description: This shaggy, multi-legged creature has a flattened face with wide nostrils and four eyes. Ivory tusks jut downward, flanking its mouth.

Name: Wolpertinger
Description: This creature appears to be a large hare with long fangs, feathered wings, and a set of antlers.

Name: Wolverine
Description: This stocky, muscular mammal is the size of a badger, its snarling lips revealing a mouth full of yellow teeth.

Name: Woodwose
Description: This green skinned green haired figure has the appearance of a gnarled old man with skin like tree bark. Its hair and beard looks like Spanish moss with brambles and leaves knotted through it.

Name: Woolly Rhinoceros
Description: This creature has massive legs and a stout body with a thick coat of brown fur. From the tip of its elongated nose rise two curving horns.

Name: Woolly Rhinoceros
Description: This creature has massive legs and a stout body with a thick coat of brown fur. From the tip of its elongated nose rise two curving horns.

Name: Worg
Description: This unusually large wolf has an evil, almost intelligent light shining in its deep red eyes.

Name: Woundwyrm
Description: This massive, eyeless draconic creature is covered in purple-hued scales and sharp, spiky protrusions.

Name: Wyrm Blue Dragon
Description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

Name: Wyrm Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Wyrm Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Wyrm White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Wyrmling Black Dragon
Description: Hissing green acid drips from the fanged maw of this blackscaled, horned dragon.

Name: Wyrmling Blue Dragon
Description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

Name: Wyrmling Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Wyrmling Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Wyrmling White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Wyvaran
Description: This dragonlike humanoid brandishes its spear, spreads its wings, and shows its fangs in a angry snarl.

Name: Xaphan
Description: A massively built satyr-like creature with blackish-brown flesh, this monster tightens its grip on its fiery falchion. Small horns jut from its forehead, just above its golden eyes. Its hair is long and black, and tied back in a braided ponytail. Two, large bat wings protrude from its back.

Name: Xill
Description: This flame-red humanoid appears to be a strange mix of insect and reptile, with four arms and twitching, fanged mandibles.

Name: Xorn
Description: This squat beast is as wide as it is tall. Strangely symmetrical, it has three arms, three legs, three eyes, and one huge mouth.

Name: Yaenit
Description: Patches of fur adorn the sickly flesh of this gangly but muscular hyena-headed humanoid.

Name: Yamabushi Tengu
Description: This humanoid creature has a fearsome mien, with a cruel red face, glaring yellow eyes, a prodigious nose, and large raven-like wings.

Name: Yamah
Description: This blue-skinned woman has blue-and-white butterfly wings. Her black hair sparkles like a starlit sky.

Name: Yamaraj
Description: This dragonlike creature has the features of a massive crow, its feathers as black as oblivion. Great, tattered wings bear it aloft as it glides effortlessly forward.

Name: Yangethe
Description: This six-eyed horror is vaguely shaped like a dead tree, but one with claws and tentacles and spidery legs.

Name: Yaoguai
Description: This creature is a mix of different animals fused together, with a bear’s torso and head, clawed ape legs, and a furred tentacle arm.

Name: Yeti
Description: This large, hulking humanoid is covered in white, shaggy fur. Its hands end in filthy and razor-sharp claws. The creature’s head is large and sports a large round mouth filled with fangs.

Name: Yeti
Description: This large, hulking humanoid is covered in white, shaggy fur. Its hands end in filthy and razor-sharp claws. The creature’s head is large and sports a large round mouth filled with fangs.

Name: Young Adult Black Dragon
Description: Hissing green acid drips from the fanged maw of this black-scaled, horned dragon.

Name: Young Adult Blue Dragon
Description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

Name: Young Adult Green Dragon
Description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

Name: Young Adult Red Dragon
Description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

Name: Young Adult White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Young Cloud Dragon
Description: This dragon has a fringed and frilled head and wings that sweep back from its shoulders to its tail. Large, piercing rose colored eyes dominate its somewhat triangular head. Its tail trails off becoming misty and translucent near the tip.

Name: Young Cloud Dragon
Description: This dragon has a fringed and frilled head and wings that sweep back from its shoulders to its tail. Large, piercing rose colored eyes dominate its somewhat triangular head. Its tail trails off becoming misty and translucent near the tip.

Name: Young Lunar Dragon
Description: A shimmering halo surrounds this regal dragon’s spine-crowned head, and its vast wings ripple like milky gossamer lit by the moon.

Name: Young Mist Dragon
Description:
This great dragon has a ridge of swept-back horns encircling its head with two larger and longer horns just above its eyes dominating the others. A ridge of similar smaller horns runs the length of its back from its shoulders to its tail. Its body is long, snake-like, and semi-material. It possesses no visible wings. Its scaled body is grayish-white. ¦ ¦ ¦
¦

Young Mist Dragon CR 7

XP 3,200
N Large dragon (air, fire, water)
¦Init +1; Senses dragon senses, mist vision; Perception +20

Name: Young Sky Dragon
Description: Although wingless, this dragon twists gracefully though the sky, its scales reflecting the shifting hues of the heavens.

Name: Young Solar Dragon
Description: This regal dragon glows like the sun. Its burnished wings shimmer the color of flames, and a crown of horns decorates its head.

Name: Young Sovereign Dragon
Description: This magnificent dragon is covered in splendid gold scales, and horns jut from its head like a crown.

Name: Young Time Dragon
Description: This dragon’s cracked scales creak with frightening, patient power. Some of its horns are ancient and brittle, others new and pristine.

Name: Young Void Dragon
Description: This dragon’s ebony scales and horns are flecked with a substance that glows an eerie green. The folds of its wings reflect a starry sky.

Name: Young Vortex Dragon
Description: This dragon twists and whips with near untraceable speed. Its horns, crests along its neck, and wings emit a glow like starlight.

Name: Young White Dragon
Description: This dragon’s scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

Name: Ypotryll
Description: This ugly creature’s porcine head features multiple horns and tusks. Its muscular body ripples with raw power.

Name: Yrthak
Description: This flying reptile has large, leathery wings and a vibrantly colored crest on its horned, narrow-snouted head.

Name: Zelekhut
Description: This creature looks like a mechanical centaur. Golden, clockwork wings sprout from its back, and its arms end in barbed chains.

Name: Zeuglodon
Description: This elongated, whale-like creature moves through the water with an eel-like motion despite its wide, fluked tail. Razor-sharp teeth fill its almost reptilian mouth.

Name: Zomok
Description: Resembling an enormous lizard composed entirely of organic plant matter, this beast shakes loose soil from its earthy wings and exhales dirt particles with every breath.

Name: Zoog
Description: This small, furry burrower has a bare, prehensile tail and a narrow, sharp-fanged mouth. The nose is subdivided into many small tentacles, which writhe constantly.
